loans.name: Natho Group

texts.en: Seesouk understands the difference a water filter can make for his family and for his group’s families.  Seesouk knows that because local water sources require boiling before consumption, boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Seesouk purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    Seesouk is excited that the filter, purchased on an affordable payment schedule, is guaranteed for two years. Consequently he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Bonita

texts.en:
Bonita is 57 years old, married, has four children of adult age and is a resident of Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is enthusiastic about her farming activities and has supported her family's needs with her business. Bonita is known for her hard work as a farmer and dedication as a mother and wife. She signed up for membership with the cooperative and is able to avail herself of the services and programs offered by Paglaum MPC. 

Bonita now requests another loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farming business. She believes that having enough fertilizers for her farm will give her more harvest.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farming business.

loans.name: Máximo

texts.es:
Máximo  es un productor que reside en una pequeña comunidad del norte de Nicaragua. Desde muy joven se dedica a la caficultura. Le gusta compartir; con su familia y comunidad, el alto valor que tiene la caficultura para el país, al ser uno de los principales rubros de la economía nacional. Además del café.

Cada año. Máximo sueña con el establecimiento de nuevas áreas, pero la falta de recursos, inicialmente para mejorar la nutrición de su cafetal, impide que comience una nueva etapa de inversión. Por lo que en esta  ocasión solicita un apoyo financiero que le permita superar la carencia de insumos y fertilizantes que necesita para este ciclo 2015-2016 y con la ayuda del equipo técnico de P.A.C logrará mejorar su productividad y sus ingresos. Con esto el próximo ciclo Máximo estaría invirtiendo en nuevos lotes de terrenos para el establecimiento de nuevas áreas de café. 

Su principal meta es mejorar las condiciones de su familia, y proveer a sus hijos todo lo que necesiten para que puedan abrirse oportunidades que les permita obtener un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Maximo is a small coffee producer who lives in a small community in Northern Nicaragua. Since very young, he has worked growing coffee. He likes to share with his family and community the high value he has in coffee agriculture for his country, because it is one of the main areas of the national economy. Besides coffee, every year Maximo dreams of establishing new areas, but the lack of resources, initially to nurture his coffee plantation, is an obstacle for him to start a new investment phase. This is why now he is requesting financial support that will allow him to overcome the scarcity of inputs and fertilizers he needs for this 2015 - 2016 cycle, and with help of the P.A.C. technical team, to improve his profitability and income. With this, in the next cycle Maximo will be investing in new lots of land to establish new areas of coffee. His main goal is to improve his family's situation and to provide his children with all they need to have opportunities that will allow them to have a better future.

loans.use: to overcome the scarcity of inputs and fertilizers he needs for this 2015-2016 cycle.

loans.name: Kadongneua Group

texts.en:
Wanh understands the difference that water filters can make for his family and for his group’s families. Wanh knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources. The water filter Wanh purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.   

Wanh is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
After working for the city of San Diego for 25 years, Dorothy retired two years ago to focus on her main passion, her life coaching business. She wanted to use her experience and educational background to help people find their purpose and achieve their professional goals.

Dorothy is very passionate about education; she received her Doctorate in Higher Education in 2011, and has been a local author in San Diego since 2009. Since her retirement, she has been making connections in the community and building her client base. She has written three books and realized there is a market for her services.

Dorothy is the author of “My Journey: Butterfly Wings”, which is based on the steps she took to get an education, and is a featured author in two other books.

She will use her loan to publish her books so that she can sell them at speaking engagements. Dorothy dreams of one day traveling all over the world and speaking to people of other languages about her books.

“Do what you love and the money will follow,” says Dorothy.

loans.use: to publish her books so that she can sell them at speaking engagements.

loans.name: Simón

texts.es:
Simón es un pequeño productor que vive en su pequeña finca de 4 mz, de las cuales 3 mz son destinadas a la producción de café. Cuenta con más de 30 años de experiencia en este rubro Su finca se ubica al norte de Nicaragua, donde existen condiciones agroclimáticas adecuadas para este tipo de cultivo.

En los últimos dos ciclos, los rendimiento de café obtenidos por este pequeño productor han disminuido debido a la Roya, que es una plaga que afectó parte de su cafetal, para lo cual se ha propuesto implementar un plan mejoramiento nutricional de forma continua para este nuevo ciclo 2015-2016. Simón está solicitando un crédito que le permita garantizar el adecuado mantenimiento a su cafetal, mediante la compra y aplicación de insumos que le ayuden a recuperar la productividad de su plantación de café.

El sueño de este pequeño emprendedor que se caracteriza por ser muy responsable con sus obligaciones, es garantizar a su familia mejores condiciones que las que él tuvo, por eso se esfuerza cada día para incrementar su producción y con ello los ingresos de los cuales depende su familia.
texts.en:
Simón is a small producer who ives on his little four-manzana [about 2.8 hectares] farm, of which three manzanas [about 2.1 hectares] are dedicated to coffee production. He has more than 30 years of experience in this field. His farm is located in the north of Nicaragua, where the agro-climatic conditions are right for this type of crop. 

In the last two growing cycles, the coffee profits obtained by this small producer have diminished because of coffee rust, a fungal disease that affected part of his coffee plantings. For that reason, a continuous nutritional improvement plan has been proposed for this new 2015-2016 cycle. Simón is requesting a loan that will allow him to ensure the proper maintenance of his coffee grove through the purchase and application of supplies that will help him to recover the productivity of his coffee crop.

This small entrepreneur, who is known for being very responsible with his obligations, dreams of guaranteeing his family better conditions than those that he had. That's why he works hard every day to increase his production, and with it, the income that his family depends on.

loans.use: to properly maintain his crops through the purchase and application of supplies that will help him to recover the productivity of his coffee crop.

loans.name: Sikha

texts.en:
Sikha hails from a very poor family. She is a married woman of 39 years. She lives with her husband, two sons and one daughter in a small village of Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. Sikha's husband is engaged in a vegetable business. Sikha is illiterate and can only sign her name. But Sikha tries her level best to provide an education to their children. Sikha's 15-year-old daughter is studying in grade 10, her 12-year-old son is studying in grade 8 and her youngest 10-year-old son is handicapped.

Sikha's husband's meager income is the main hindrance in the education of her children. Her daughter Madhumita reads in grade 10 at Dhupguri Girls’ High School. Recently she has passed 9th grade with good marks. Her parents plan to provide a better education to Madhumita so that she can lead a better life. With an aim to be a nurse in future, she wants a higher education. But their household income is not sufficient to meet her all educational expenses.

Sikha heard that BJS (Kiva’s partner) gives education loans to the poor and meritorious students so that they can keep on with their studies. So, she has taken a loan from them. She plans to use the total loan amount for her daughter's education. She will use the loan for school and coaching fees and purchase uniforms and books for her daughter.

Sikha and her daughter, Madhumita, (in the picture) give their thanks to the lenders (BJS and Kiva).

loans.use: to bear the education-related costs for her daughter.

loans.name: Meuangmuan Group

texts.en:
Pom is excited the filter was available on an affordable payment plan. Pom and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies. Charcoal, firewood, and even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years.

The water filter Pom and her group purchased is guaranteed for two years, but is known to function for up to five years. Pom and her group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. After totaling up the costs, Pom and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Sabitri

texts.en:
Sabitri is a typical housewife, 31 years old, hailing from Dhupguri. Her family consists of five members: her husband and three children (two daughters and one son). They all are studying in school.

Sabitri's 16-year-old daughter Reshmi is a commendable student in Vidyashram D.J.V.N. High School. She reads in grade 10. She scored good marks in her last annual exam. She is very serious about her studies and always wants to get good marks in the exams. Reshmi will appear for her grade 10 board examination next year. So, she needs special guidance from a private tutor and some books for her uninterrupted education. Her father is engaged in centering work. Her family’s monthly income hardly meets the household expenses and it seems like a difficult task now to bear the educational costs for her.

To support Reshmi's schooling, Sabitri is seeking an education loan from Kiva's field partner, BJS. She will use the loan money to bear the educational costs of her daughter. Sabitri hopes this loan will help Reshmi to continue her study without any financial problems.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's educational costs.

loans.name: Felly

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Felly works hard to support her family.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from making nipa roofs. Felly is borrowing 10,500 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

Felly has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto es un cafetalero desde hace más de 30 años. Inició en este rubro como jornalero, pero ahora es poseedor de una pequeña finca de 14 mz. con 2 mz de ella con el cultivo de café; la que ha logrado sacar adelante gracias a la entrega que impregna en las labores diarias.

Por la baja nutrición en que se encuentran sus cafetos en el ciclo anterior éstos se vieron afectados por “Roya”, plaga que afectó el rendimiento de la cosecha. Se tomaron medidas de mitigación para garantizar, al menos, una cosecha de calidad (aunque en menor proporción).

Una mejora en la cosecha; calidad y rendimiento, significaría el ingreso económico que necesita el Alberto y sus colaboradores, para seguir adelante con esta dura tarea del cafetalero. 
Para este Ciclo, Alberto solicita el financiamiento para la implementación de un manejo tecnificado que mejore la nutrición de sus plantas.
texts.en:
Alberto has been a coffee grower for more than 30 years. He began as a day laborer, but now he owns a small farm of 14 manzanas [one manzana is approximately 1.72 acres] with 2 manzanas dedicated to growing coffee. Thanks to his daily efforts he has been able to get ahead. 

Because of the poor nutrition of his crops in the last cycle, they were affected by roya, or coffee rust [a fungus that affects the coffee harvest.] Steps were taken to mitigate its effects and guarantee the quality, if not the quantity of production.

Improvement to the quality and yield of the harvest would lead to the better income that Alberto and his collaborators need in order to get ahead in this difficult task of coffee growing.

For this cycle, Alberto is requesting a loan to implement technical management that would better nourish his plants.

loans.use: to improve the quality and yield of the harvest, which would mean income that Alberto and his family need.

loans.name: Jaime Noe

texts.es: Jaime de 36 años de edad vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañera de vida y sus 4 hijos de 16, 14, 13 y 6 años de edad a los cuales están sacando adelante en sus estudios para que sean personas de bien en la vida, Jaime presta sus servicios en una finca desde hace un año desempeñando la labor de jornalero  lo  cual con los ingresos le permite llevar el sustento del hogar igual su compañera de vida aporta en los gastos del hogar. Jaime desea comprar láminas para hacer el cambio de techo ya que las que tiene están dañadas y cuando llueve se le moja una parte en el interior de su vivienda y por eso solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: láminas, clavos y madera para poder mejorar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jaime is 36 years old and lives in his own home along with his life partner and their 4 children, ages 16, 14, 13 and 6 years old who are working hard on their studies so that they can have a good life. 

Jaime has offered his services as a day laborer on a ranch for the last year. The income helps him support his household, and his partner also supports them. 

 Jaime wants to buy corrugated metal to replace his roof, since what he has now is damaged, and when it rains a part of the interior of his home gets wet. 

He is seeking a FUSAI loan to invest in corrugated metal, nails and wood to improve the roof on his home.

loans.use: to invest in corrugated metal, nails and wood to be able to improve the roof on his home.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 52 years old, married, has five children of adult age and is a resident of Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. to restock store with commodities like canned goods, confectioneries, condiments and other consumable items. She helps her husband in providing the needs of their family through her retailing business of consumable items. Susan owns and operates a sari-sari store (convenience store) that gives her an income of PHP 500 per day. Through the financial assistence of the cooperative, Susan is able to turn the odds in her favor. She has nurtured her membership with the cooperative and continuously provides the needs of her family. Recently, she availed a loan of PHP 5,000 to restock store with commodities like canned goods, confectioneries, condiments and other consumable items.

loans.use: to restock her store with commodities like canned goods, confectioneries, condiments and other consumable items.

loans.name: Serenia

texts.en:
Serenia is 58 years old, married and has four adult-aged children. She lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. Serenia owns a sari-sari store (convenience store) that provides her with a meager income. 

She has requested a loan to redeem pawned coco land. Starting her coco farm again will allow her to yield additional income for the family, helping augment her living conditions.

loans.use: to redeem pawned coco land.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with seven children. She runs a general store in the Philippines and industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, including a bake shop.

Gloria successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. She has requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as canned goods, personal care products, etc. 

Gloria dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge de 45 años, al no poseer un empleo formal y tener la necesidad de sostener económicamente a su familia, decidió abrirse a la oportunidad de iniciar una vida como comerciante de prendas de vestir.  En la actualidad cuenta con cinco años de experiencia y una clientela consolidada a quienes les ofrece comodidad en sus pagos y todos los días sale de su vivienda ubicada en un sector de Barranquilla con mucho optimismo y entusiasmo a realizar ventas. Con la finalidad de surtir con nuevos modelos de ropa, está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  Con esta inversión podrá obtener las utilidades esperadas para ofrecer bienestar a sus tres hijas menores de edad, así mismo se acercará a la meta de abrir un local al público y construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jorge is 45 years old. Since he did not have a formal job and needed to support his family financially, he decided to pursue the opportunity to start life as a clothing salesman. 

Currently he has five years experience and an established clientele to whom he offers ease of payment terms. Each day he leaves his Barranquilla home with great optimism and enthusiasm to make his sales.

 With the goal of a new assortment of clothing styles, he is applying for a Kiva loan. This is the first loan he has solicited from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. 

With this investment he will be able to obtain what he needs to provide for his three young daughters, as well as come closer to his goal of opening a store and building his home.

loans.use: to stock new styles of clothing.

loans.name: Adelfa

texts.en:
Adelfa is 40 years old and the single mother of one school-aged child. She lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. Adelfa has been involved in vegetable vending for five years. Through this, she has supported her need for education. 

Adelfa has learned about the programs and services offered by the cooperative to small-time borrowers like her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more stock of vegetables and spices for selling. 

Adelfa hopes for the success of her business. She is confident that she will never run out of capital because she knows Paglaum MPC is on her side.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of vegetables and spices for selling.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 54 years old, married and has three children of adult age. She lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur where she has a rice field and corn field. She personally manages her farm, giving her good profits. 

Elena is a good member of Paglaum MPC with no record of default. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase 20 sacks of fertilizer and other preparations for her seed beds.

loans.use: to purchase 20 sacks of fertilizer and other preparations for her seed beds.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Edwina

texts.en:
Edwina is a dedicated mother, loving wife and a hard-working farmer. She is 45 years old and has six children of school age. She has been in the farming business for 15 years. She has the good fortune of having a good harvest every cropping season. 

This cropping season, she wants to start up immediately so she has requested another loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase 10 bags of fertilizer. Edwina believes that there really is wealth in farming.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of fertilizer.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ruth, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre de un niño de 8 años de edad que está estudiando segundo grado y un bebe recién nacido, ella se casó hace10 años con su esposo, su esposo trabaja de seguridad en la ciudad y viaja todos los días de la semana.

Ruth, ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo de secretaria en un negocio en la ciudad, además ha trabajado en una casa cuidando y haciendo los quehaceres del hogar.- Hoy en día también se dedica  a vender lencerías por medio de revistas y ella realiza los pedidos para luego hacer la entrega a sus clientes.

Ruth, solicita el crédito para comprar 100 pollos de engorde y concentrado para alimentarlos, además una parte la invertirá para comprar lociones y cosméticos, para obtener mejores ganancias y así darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.

Ruth, sueña con mejorar su vivienda y seguir apoyando a su hijo con sus estudios para que logre culminar una carrera profesional en la universidad.
texts.en: Ruth is 28 years old. She studied through high school. She has an 8 year old son who is in second grade and a newborn baby. She married her husband 10 years ago, he works as a security guard in the city and travels every day of the week. Ruth has worked for a long time as a secretary for a business in the city. Besides, he has worked in a house, taking care of it and doing the chores of the household. Today, she also works selling lingerie through a catalog and she fills the orders to deliver to her clients. Ruth is asking for a loan to buy 100 chickens to raise them, and chicken food concentrate  to feed them. In addition, one part of the loan will be used to buy lotions and cosmetics,  to obtain bigger earnings and thus give her family a better quality of life. Ruth dreams with improving her house and to continue supporting her son with his studies, so that he can finish a professional career in the university.

loans.use: To buy 100 chickens to raise them,  and chicken food concentrate to feed them. In addition, she will invest one portion of the loan to buy lotions and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo tiene 56 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposa y sus hijos ya mayores que con mucho esfuerzo los saco adelante en sus estudios y ahora son ellos que ayudan a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, el es un hombre muy trabajador ya que presta sus servicios en una finca como jornalero desde hace treinta y cinco años, tiempo durante el cual su trabajo le ha permitido llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Alfredo desea comprar láminas para cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y debido a  que por sus propios medios no alcanza a cubrir estos gastos el solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: laminas, madera, clavos y de esa manera cambiarle el techo de su vivienda para que cuando llueva ya no se le mojen sus pocas pertenencias que posee.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 56 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and his children who are grown. Through great effort, Alfredo was able to help them get ahead in their studies, and now they help their parents cover household expenses. A hardworking man, for the past 35 years Alfredo has worked on farms as a day laborer. This work has enabled him to provide for his family. 
Alfredo hopes to purchase metal sheets which he will use to replace the roof of his house, which has deteriorated. On his own, Alfredo does not have enough money to make this purchase, so he has requested a loan from FUSAI which he will invest in the metal, wood and nails. This way he will be able to replace his roof so that when it rains, his few worldly possessions do not get wet.

loans.use: to purchase materials to replace the roof of his home.

loans.name: Denis Alfredo

texts.es:
Denis es un pequeño productor de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Se dedica principalmente a la caficultura, con lo cual ha sacado adelante a sus hijos. Desde hace más de 15 años, él está a cargo de su pequeña finca de 10 manzanas, la cual ha venido mejorando y en la que cuenta con 2 manzanas de café. Su finca está certificada por Fairtrade, UTZ y C.A.F.E Practices y la producción promedio de café que ha obtenido en los últimos tres años es de 150 quintales de café pergamino.

El mayor desafío que ha enfrentado en la producción de café, es la presencia de plagas y enfermedades, lo cual está seguro logrará mantener bajo control con un plan de fertilización adecuado. Por tal razón, está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que le permita darle un adecuado mantenimiento a sus plantaciones. Su meta es continuar mejorando su finca bajo un plan de manejo integrado que le permita continuar invirtiendo gradualmente en el desarrollo y diversificación de su finca, lo cual está seguro logrará con buen acompañamiento técnico y su dedicación al trabajo para poder seguir sosteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Denis is a small farmer in the northern part of Nicaragua. His principal crop is coffee, and through his coffee he has gotten his children ahead. For over 15 years he has managed his small farm of approximately 17 acres, which he has improved over the years and on which he plants about 3.5 acres of coffee. His farm has been certified as fair trade by U.T.Z. and also by C.A.F.E. Practices. Over the last three years his average yield has been 15,000 lbs of certified coffee. The greatest challenge Denis has faced in his coffee production has been the presence of pests and diseases, which he is sure he'll be able to control with a proper fertilization plan. For this reason he is requesting a loan to purchase supplies and fertilizers which will enable him to maintain his plantation adequately. 
Denis' goal is to continue improving his land through this integrated management plan which will enable him to continue investing gradually in the development and diversification of the farm. Through careful technique and hard work he will achieve this goal and continue providing for his family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizers which he will use on his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 36 years old, married, has three children of school age and lives at Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She has been a vegetable grower on her place for more than 10 years. She learned about Paglaum MPC and signed up for membership. She has enjoyed the benefits of being a member of the cooperative. 

Recently, she took a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase seeds and bags of fertilizers for her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and bags of fertilizers for her farming business

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Nakhamchouangneua Group

texts.en:
Vaen knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  

The water filter Vaen purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    

Vaen is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule, and the filter is guaranteed for two years – so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come. 

Vaen understands the difference the water filter can make for his family and for his group’s families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Vergonia

texts.en:
Vergonia is 64 years old, married, has seven children of adult age and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She has been into farming for 10 years. Through this farming business, she is able to provide for the needs of her family and even helped her grandchildren on their schooling. 

She earns PHP 20,000 per cropping period on her farming activity. 

Recently, she loan took a loan to purchase 10 bags of fertilizers and pesticides. She is thankful for the services and programs provided by Paglaum MPC, especially its insurance and healthcare services.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of fertilizers and pesticides

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Nakhamphanh Group

texts.en:
Khamfong and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years.  

The water filter Khamfong and his group purchased is guaranteed for two years, but is known to function for up to five years. Khamfong and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Khamfong and his group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

Khamfong is excited the filter was available on an affordable payment plan.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Keangchom Group

texts.en:
Phavieng knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources. The water filter Phavieng purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost of foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    

Phavieng is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.  

Phavieng understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is 52 years old, married, has one child and lives at Ozamiz City. She has owned and operated a fish pond on their place for eight years. For eight years, their fish pond has given them a good harvest and has alleviated their financial conditions. She has been able to send her only child to college. However, Evelyn said that their success in their business was made possible through the financial assistance of Paglaum MPC. Recently, she availed another loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase bags of cement, plywood, and nails and pay the labor cost for house renovation. Evelyn hopes to live comfortably in a decent house.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement, plywood, and nails and pay the labor cost for house renovation.

loans.name: Arceli

texts.en: Arceli is 53 years old, married, and has 4 children, the majority of which are school age. She is from Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She owns and operates a sari-sari store (general store) that gives her an income of 10,000 PHP per month. Through the financial services offered by Paglaum MPC, Arceli has been able to sustain her business for more than 5 years. This time, she avails a loan of 10,000 PHP to restock her sari-sari store with consumable goods, such as canned foods, condiments, and confections.

loans.use: to restock her sari-sari store with consumable goods, such as canned foods, condiments, and confections.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Annaliza works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending. Annaliza is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase flour, yeast, margarine, sugar, etc. for her bakery business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Annaliza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, margarine, sugar, etc for her bakery business.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto es un pequeño productor de café de Jinotega. Vive en su pequeña finca con su esposa y sus  hijos. Su plantación de café es de 8 manzanas y está integrado al proceso de certificación Fairtrade. La producción de café promedio de este pequeño productor ha sido de 320 quintales pergamino en los últimos 3 años. Hasta ahora ha venido enfrentando dificultades con la nutrición de su café ya que no cuenta con los recursos que le permitan la implementación de un adecuado mantenimiento. 

Por lo tanto, está solicitando un financiamiento que le permita la adquisición de abonos y foliares que le ayuden a mejorar la condición nutricional de sus cafetos, con lo que podrá obtener mejores resultados en este ciclo agrícola 2015-2016. Esto asegurará una mayor calidad y además disminuirá las pérdidas por caída de grano que logra madurar. Está seguro que con su trabajo y esfuerzo podrá lograr una buena producción y obtener mayores rendimientos.
texts.en:
Gilberto is a small producer of coffee in Jinotega. He lives on his small farm with his wife and children. His coffee plantation is 8 manzanas (about 14 acres) and is in the process of Fairtrade certification. The average production of this small coffee producer has been 320 quintals (about 3,200 lbs.) of pergamino coffee in the last three years. Up until now he has been facing difficulties nourishing his coffee as he does not have the resources that would allow the implementation of proper maintenance. 

Therefore, he is requesting funding that would allow him to acquire manure and leaf fertilizers that would help him improve the nutritional status of his coffee plants, with which he will be able to obtain better results in this agricultural cycle 2015-2016. This will ensure a higher quality and also decrease the losses due to the falling of beans that manage to ripen. He is sure that with his work and effort he will be able to achieve good production and obtain higher yields.

loans.use: maintain his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Ledelline

texts.en: Ledelline is 32 years old, married, has three school-age children and lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She is a fish vendor and owns a stall in their local public market. Ledelline has been into this kind of business for 15 years. Through this business, she has been able to support her parents and this time her own family. Ledelline has been a member of Paglaum MPC for nine years and has enjoyed the programs and services offered by the cooperative. This time, she availed a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Jose Wilder

texts.es:
Jose tiene 23 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Santo Tomás que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

José se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 3 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto José espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José, 23, lives with his wife and their children in a house of their own, made of rustic materials, in the district of Santo Tomás, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountain ranges of Peru.
This is a peaceful area whose inhabitants are farmers, cattle-rearers, and traders.
José has been growing coffee for three years and people in the area think very highly of him on both a personal and professional level.
He will use the loan to buy manure and fertiliser to tend properly to his crops, and to hire farm hands for the harvest.
José thus hopes to have better-quality coffee to offer his customers.
This will increase his earnings and, as a result, improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertiliser and to hire farm hands.

loans.name: Ousonyado Group

texts.fr: Bimata est une femme âgée de  trente quatre (34) mariée mère de quatre (04) enfants dont trois (03) scolarisés. Elle à une expérience de dix (10) ans dans l'activité de coiffure et la vente de mèche et de produits de beauté. Son salon de coiffure fait face à une grande voie et aussi elle coiffe bien ses clients la propriété est de rigueur dans son salon ce qui fait que ses clients se sente à l'aise et l'a fréquente à tout moment. tous ses atouts peuvent l'amener à réussir.
texts.en:
Bimata is a 34-year-old woman who is married and has four children.  Three of her children currently attend school.  She has ten years' experience in hairdressing and selling beauty products.

Her hairdressing salon opens onto a busy road and she is very skilled at her job.  Her salon is rigorously clean which helps put her clients at ease and contributes to the large number of customers that she always has.

All these positive points ensure that Bimata will be successful.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and other beauty and hair products.

loans.name: Gome Saya Group

texts.fr: Massiata âgée de 53 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants dont 04 scolarisés, elle exerce sont activité depuis 10  ans ce qui fait sa force c'est qu'elle à beaucoup d'expérience et aussi un bon emplacement pour son activité.Elle respecte toujours ces engagement à ACFIME. elle vend au marché d'ou son besoin de financement pour acheter ses marchandises telles que les condiments (choux, oignon, tomate etc...) en quantité suffisante et 40 litres d'huile par semaine pour revendre afin de tirer un bénéfice pour pouvoir assurer la scolarité de ses enfants et la survie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Massiata is 53 years old, married and mother to six children.  Four of her children currently attend school.  She has been running her business for ten years which has given her a lot of experience.  She also benefits from a good location at the market where she sells her products.  She sells food ingredients (such as cabbages, onions and tomatoes) and forty litres of oil a week.

Massiata uses her earnings to provide for the education of her children and the survival of her family.  She has always respected her committments to the field partner, ACFIME.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients for resale.

loans.name: Grupo San José La Concordia. Group

texts.es:
Rudy (él primero del lado izquierdo de la fotografía)  es un hombre 25 años de edad, es soltero tiene un hijo de 2 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Totonicapán. Para Rudy no hay nada más importante que su querida familia es por ello que para obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes,  él tiene cuatro años de ejercer esta labor, pero para mejorar sus ingresos trabaja como carpintero elaborando muebles para el hogar y oficina. Rudy por ser un joven muy amable y generoso cuenta con muchos clientes en su negocio,  y con los productos que cuenta ya no se da abasto es por ello que junto a un grupo de personas solicita un crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de productos de abarrotes como: azúcar, arroz, frijol, huevos entre otros.
El gran sueño de Rudy e comprar una cuerda de terreno para construir su casa en ella.
texts.en:
Rudy, first on the left in the photo, is 25 years old and has a 2-year-old son. His humble family lives in a community in Totonicapán. For Rudy, there is nothing more important than his dear family; it is for them that he earns his income by buying and selling groceries. Rudy has been doing this work for four years but in order to increase his income, he also works as a carpenter, building furniture for the home and office. Rudy is a friendly and generous young man and has many customers at his business. He no longer has any stock, however, and is therefore applying for a loan as part of this group. Rudy will invest his share of the loan in groceries such as sugar, rice, beans, eggs and more.

Rudy's big dream is to buy a stretch of land to build a house.

loans.use: to buy grocery products.

loans.name: Calidad No Cantidad Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario calidad, no cantidad está conformado por tres mujeres emprendedoras, que solicitan por segundo ciclo el financiamiento en Adim, coordinado por Tamara una mujer emprendedora de 39 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijos de 21  y 14 años quienes son su mayor motivación ella es propietaria de un comedor donde ofrece una variedad de platillos a sus clientes desde hace veinte años, con el crédito anterior logró comprar utensilios de cocina y trastes, solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, arroz, frijoles y leña, la segunda socia es Ludys de 43 años, se dedica a la venta de fritanga y la tercer socia es Claudia de 32 años propietaria de una pulpería.
texts.en:
The "Calidad, No Cantidad" loan group has three enterprising members, all women, who are applying for their second loan from ADIM. The group is coordinated by Tamara, an enterprising 39-year-old single mother to two children, ages 21 and 14 years old. Tamara's children are her biggest motivation.

Tamara owns a restaurant where she has been offering a variety of dishes to customers for 20 years. Tamara used her previous loan to kitchen utensils and other items. She is applying for this loan in order to buy meat, rice, beans and firewood. 

The second member of this group is 43-year-old Ludys, who makes a living selling fried snacks. The third member is 32-year-old Claudia; she owns a grocery store.

loans.use: solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, arroz, frijoles y leñ

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es:
Reina, de 47 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, sus padres le enseñaron las actividades de la ganadería y la agricultura, está acompañada y su pareja le ayuda a cultivar y a cuidar las vacas que poseen.

Reina, se dedica a trabajar en las parcelas junto a su pareja durante la mañana y en el transcurso de la tarde se dedican a ordeñar las vacas para vender la leche. 

Reina, necesita el crédito para comprar una novilla, porque en un futuro le ayudara a producir más leche y podrá empezar a elaborar lácteos como queso y crema.

Reina, sueña con tener una ganadería muy grande con muchas vacas.
texts.en:
Reina is 47 years old and has a ninth-grade education. Her parents taught her how to raise cattle and to farm. Reina has a partner who helps with her crops and to look after the cows that she has.

Reina makes a living working the land with her partner in the mornings. In the afternoons, the couple milks the cows to sell the milk.

Reina needs this loan in order to buy a heifer because it will help her to produce more milk and begin selling dairy products such as cheese and cream.

Reina's dream is of having a very big ranch with many cows.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: La Volonté De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Aline est une jeune femme de 42 ans avec 3 enfants scolarisés, ca fait plus de 20 ans qu'elle est dans l'activité des ventes d'habits, son succès repose sur la qualité des ces produits et de la diversité.Elle est à son trois crédits à ACFIME et à toujours honorée ces engagements. Elle prends le crédit pour acheter des habits pour 100000F, des chaussures pour 25000f et des sacs pour 25000f
texts.en:
Aline is 42 years old and has three children who all attend school.  She has been selling clothing for more than twenty years and is successful because of the quality and diversity of her products.

This will be the third loan for Aline with the field partner, ACFIME.  She has always repaid her loans fully and on time.

Aline will use this loan to buy clothing for 100,000 francs CFA, shoes for 25,000 francs CFA and bags for 25,000 francs CFA.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes and bags for sale.

loans.name: Peniel 2 Group

texts.es:
Grupo ¨Peniel 2¨ los integran 3 mujeres quien están con ADIM por primera vez, solicitando a los inversionistas de KIVA, crédito para mejorar e incrementar su negocio. 
La coordinadora del grupo es Kenia, de 30 años, casada y con 1 hijo de 6 años, se dedica a la preparación y venta de comidas fritangueras desde hace 6 años, su esposo le brinda la ayuda económica para que ella salga adelante. Su mama le ayuda en la preparación de la comidas. Con el crédito comprara los insumos que requieren esta actividad como es plátano, leña, carnes de res y cerdo, arroz, aceite, carbón y una parte de su préstamo lo ocupara para embaldosar el piso, así ofrecerles un local de calidad a sus clientes. 
Las demás socias son Aurora, 44 años dedicada a la preparación y venta de comida en su domicilio; y Francys de 21 años quien vende calzado de manera ambulante en su comunidad. Con las ganancias que obtendrán estas mujeres emprendedoras están seguras de salir adelante con su familia
texts.en:
The "Peniel 2" group is made up of 3 women who are with ADIM for the first time. They are asking Kiva investors for a loan to improve and grow their businesses.

The coordinator of the group is Kenia who is 30 years old and married with one 6-year-old son. For the last six years she has worked preparing and selling fried foods. Her husband provides financial support for her so that she can be successful. Her mother helps her to prepare the food.

With the loan she will buy the ingredients that she needs for her work, such as bananas, firewood, pork and beef, rice, oil and charcoal. Part of the loan will also be used to tile the floor so that she can offer better quality premises to her clients.

The other members are Aurora, 44, who prepares and sells food in her home; and Francys, 21, who sells footwear in the streets of her community. With the profits that they will earn, these enterprising women are sure to help their families succeed.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing and selling food, and to tile the business premises.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora María de 66 años de edad, vive con su esposo no tiene hijos que dependen de ella y vive en una comunidad al sur  de Honduras, tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 06  años al negocio de venta de abarrotaría y frescos, también vende ropa que le mandan los hijos de los Estados Unidos.
Doña María es  una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de sacar adelante a su familia esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para mejora de vivienda y quiere comprar sementó, arena, ladrillos, varillas y también para la compra de arroz, azúcar, harina, café, pan, etc. para su negocio.
Doña María con el apoyo del préstamo  pretende mejorar su calidad de vida  ya es su quinto préstamo que solicita a Prisma es un excelente cliente. Su sueño es mejorar más su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2015.
texts.en:
Sra. María is 66 years old and lives with her husband. She has no dependent children and lives in a community in southern Honduras. She has her own home and has been in the business of selling groceries and soft drinks for six years. She also sells clothing that is shipped to her from her children in the United States. Doña María is an enterprising woman who greatly wants to succeed on behalf of her family. 

She is requesting a new loan for home improvements, and wants to buy cement, sand, bricks and rods. She will also buy rice, sugar, flour, coffee, bread, etc. for her business. 

With the help of this loan, Doña María intends to improve her quality of life. This is the fifth loan she has requested from Prisma and she is an excellent client. Her dream is to improve her business even more.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2015.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and rods, as well as rice, sugar, flour, coffee, bread, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Zhamila

texts.ru: Жамила, 56 лет, замужем, есть 2 сыновей и дочь. У нее среднее образование, она оптимистично идет по жизни, знает конкретно чего хочет и добивается всего своими силами. В качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 5 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Жамилы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы. Для содержания скота есть сарай. На 0,92 Га она выращивает картофель, кукурузу и помидоры для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для откорма. Доходы от кредита Жамила планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и образование ее внуков.
texts.en:
Zhamila is 56, married, and the mother of two sons and one daughter.  She has a secondary education and a positive attitude towards life.  She knows exactly what she wants and how to achieve everything on her own.  In order to provide an income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which she started five years ago.  Thanks to her very hard work, she now has two cows on her farm, as well as a barn to keep them in.  She also grows potatoes, corn and tomatoes for resale on 0.92 hectare of land.  

Eager to further grow her farming business, Zhamila has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow for fattening.  She plans to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her number of domestic animals and to pay for her grandchildren's education.

loans.use: to purchase one cow for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto tiene 45 años de edad, conviviente , sin hijos a su cargo , vive en casa propia; en el distrito de Oyotún,la cual es una zona rural, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, Costa norte de Perú.

Luis se dedica a brindar servicio de jornalería; hace 10 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para invertir en Activo fijo; compra de dos mochilas para fumigar, palanas y otras herramientas de labranza; esto le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus herramientas y brindar un mejor servicio, lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 45 years old, lives with his partner and has no dependent children. He lives in his own house in the district of Oyotún. This is a rural area in Chiclayo province in the region of Lambayeque, on the north coast of Peru. 

Luis has earned a living as a day labourer for the last 10 years. He runs his business from his home. He is asking for a loan to invest in some fixed assets; buying two backpacks for fumigation, shovels and other work tools. This will help him to keep his tools in better condition and to provide a better service. This will generate more income for him which will result in improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two backpacks for fumigation, shovels and other work tools.

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru: Гулчахон из района Шахринав 37 лет. Она замужем и мать одного ребёнка. Гулчахон отличная портниха. Она занимается этой деятельностью более 6 лет. Она очень любит свою работу и одновременно занимается работой по дому. У них нет в доме хорошего источника дохода. Основной доход это работа Гулчахон. Гулчахон шьет очень красивые платья. В первую очередь она предоставляет услуги своим клиенткам. Для нее очень важно, чтобы ее клиентки остались довольны и благодарны, чтобы стали для нее постоянными клиентками, и чтобы рекомендовали ее своим подругам. Однако в данный момент Гулчахон не в состоянии принимать заказы, так как её швейная машинка хорошо не работает и у них не с чем жить. Гулчахон срочно нужно купить новую швейную машинку и улучшить жизненные условия своей семьи. Она очень нуждается в вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Guljahon is 37 and she comes from the Shahrinav district of Tajikistan.  She is married and the mother of one child.  She is also a skilled seamstress and she has been involved in this activity for over six years.  She loves her work and manages at the same time to take care of the household chores.  The family doesn't have a better source of income; the money that Guljahon makes is their main source of income.  Guljahon sews beautiful dresses.  While providing her services to her customers, she really values their satisfaction and gratefulness because she wants them to stay with her and also to recommend her services to their friends.  Unfortunately, Guljahon is not taking any order at the moment because her sewing machine is no longer working properly.  As a consequence, the family has nothing to live with. Guljahon needs to buy a new sewing machine as soon as possible in order to improve her family's living conditions.  She really needs your support.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Olga Patricia

texts.es: Olga aprendió a elaborar Bollos por tradición familiar, su abuela y su madre se dedican a esta misma actividad y observando su proceso productivo ella logro aprender. Olga ofrece sus productos en un puesto al norte de la ciudad de Barranquilla, todos los días a partir de las 3 p.m. hasta las 9 p.m., sus clientes llegan hasta su lugar de trabajo y le solicitan las diversas clases de bollo que elabora; bollo de maíz verde, bollo de queso y bollo de yuca.   Ella compra los ingredientes en el mercado público de Barranquilla y para incrementar su producción, está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en maíz, queso y yuca.  Con esta inversión pretende duplicar sus ventas y ofrecer bienestar a su pequeña hija de cuatro años de edad.  Su meta a futuro es remodelar su vivienda para mejorar su condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Olga learned to prepare bollos (traditional Colombian food of the Caribbean coastal region) from family tradition. Her grandmother and mother also work in the same activity, and she learned from observing their production process. 

Olga offers her products at a post in the north of the City of Barranquilla, every day from 3pm to 9pm. Her clients come to her post and ask her for the different types of bollo that she makes; green corn bollo, bollo with cheese, and yuca bollo. She buys the ingredients at the public market of Barranquilla.

To increase her production, she is applying for a Kiva loan, which she will invest in corn, cheese, and yuca. This is the first financing she has made with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With this investment she intends to double her sales and provide welfare to her little daughter of 4 years of age. Her goal in the future is to remodel her house to improve the quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in corn, cheese, and yuca

loans.name: Lilliam Marina

texts.es:
Lilliam de 37 años de edad, casada con dos hijos menores de edad, es originaria del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región, se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal.  Gracias a sus perseverancia ha salido a delante con su negocio y su familia.  En la actualidad lucha para brindarle a sus pequeños hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
Gracia a sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica una pulpería es una pequeña venta ubicada en su casa de habitación que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, aceite, detergente, jugos, gaseosas, fósforos, etc.  La rutina de trabajo de esta mujer es de unas doce horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Lilliam agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Lilliam is 37 years old and is married with two minor children. She comes from Sauce, a town in the northern part of the region. She is a hardworking, responsible person with a desire for self-improvement. Thanks to her perseverance she has been successful with her business and her family. Currently she is fighting to give her little children better conditions in life.

Due to her desire to get ahead she has, as financial support, a small grocery store. It is a small store in her house where she sells groceries in small quantities, such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, oil, detergent, juice, soft drinks, matches and other products. Lilliam's work routine is to spend some twelve hours a day selling her products. 

The goal of the loan is to invest in working capital and support her business in the buying and selling of groceries, so that in the not-too-distant future she can improve her income. Lilliam is grateful for the help that Kiva investors give to people of limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua, so that they can have a dignified working environment.

loans.use: to stock her small grocery store with products.

loans.name: Jaime Del Socorro

texts.es:
Jaime es un productor de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Vive en su finca de 28 manzanas, de las cuales 17 son de café. Junto a su esposa ha logrado una excelente administración de los recursos que la finca provee, pero debido a las exigencias del mercado, Jaime se ha visto en la necesidad de implementar un manejo tecnificado que le permita obtener mejores resultados en cada ciclo productivo.

Actualmente ejecuta un plan de mejoramiento nutricional que le ayudará a superar uno de sus obstáculos más grande, la productividad de su finca, pero para esto está solicitando un financiamiento que le ayude a complementar la inversión que ya ha ido ejecutando desde el inicio del 2015. 

Con este financiamiento logrará terminar de comprar todos los foliares y abonos que le permitirán que sus cafetos sean más productivos, lo que derivará en una mejora en los ingresos para su familia y colaboradores.
texts.en:
Jaime is a producer from the Northern zone of Nicaragua. He lives in a farm of 28 trees, of which 17 are coffee trees. Together with his wife he has achieved an excellent administration of the farm's resources. Due to the demands of the market, however, Jaime has seen the need to implement a more technical way of management, which will help him obtain better results in each productive cycle. 

Recently he has executed a plan of nutritional improvement, which will help overcome one of his biggest challenges, the productivity of his farm. For this he is applying for a loan that will help complement the investment that he has already started since the beginning of 2015. 

With this loan, he will finish purchasing all the liquid plant feed and fertilizers that will allow his coffee plantation to become more productive. This will lead to a better income for his family and his collaborators.

loans.use: to purchase liquid plant feed and fertilizers for his coffee plantation

loans.name: Dagoberto

texts.es: Dagoberto de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo de cuatro años de edad, el es un hombre muy dedicado su trabajo ya que gracias a su actividad laboral con  los gastos del hogar. Dagoberto trabaja como jornalero en una finca desde hace diecisiete años y es así como el se gana el pan de cada día. Dagoberto  desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda porque las laminas que tiene el techo de su casa ya están deterioradas y cuando llueve se moja una parte en el interior de su  de su vivienda lo que ocaciona intranquilidad en su familia, por esa razon solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: laminas pines etc, para poder cambiar el techo de su vivienda. Anteriromente Dagoberto obtuvo un credito con el cual inicio la reparacion del techo pero el monto le fue insuficiente para realizarlo por completo es por ello que el solicita este nuevo credito con el fin de terminar las reparaciones del techo y poder asi brindar a su familia una mayor proteccion.
texts.en:
Dagoberto, 36 years old, live in his own house together with his wife and his 4-year-old son. He is a man very dedicated to his work, since thanks to his labor activities he can afford his living expenses. Dagoberto has been working as a farm laborer since 17 years ago, and this is how he wins the bread every day. 

Dagoberto wishes to change the roof of his house because the sheets are now deteriorated, and when it rains a part of the inside becomes wet, which causes an unease in the family. For this reason, he is applying for a loan to FUSAI to invest in sheets, pins, etc. to change the roof of his house. 

Previously Dagoberto obtained a loan with which he started the roof repairs, but the amount was insufficient to achieve it completely.  This is why he is applying for a new loan with the goal of finishing the repairs and to provide his family with greater protection.

loans.use: to invest in sheets, pins, etc. to change the roof of his house

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is 61 years old, single and lives in Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has been involved in a hog raising business for more than 30 years. She has mastered this business knowing she has to provide the needs of her family. 

Ana has raised 2 sows and now she has 9 piglets. She has been a member of Paglaum MPC since the year 2001 and has enjoyed the program and services it offers. 

Recently she applied for a loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase bags of animal feeds.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feeds.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 53 years old, married and lives in Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She manages a business buying and selling vegetables and spices. Through this business she earns a profit of PHP 5,000 per month. 

Gemma signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and is availing herself of the various services the cooperative offers to its members. Now she is borrowing an amount of PHP 10,000 to purchase vegetables and spices for her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and spices for her business.

loans.name: Carly

texts.en:
Carly is 77 years old, married and lives in Lao Proper, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is a pensioner - a member of Paglaum MPC and has enjoyed its various programs and services especially for life insurance and financial assistance to members. 

This time she is availing herself of another loan to pay for the renewal of her mortuary insurance premium. She hopes that Paglaum MPC can help more clients like her.

loans.use: to pay for the renewal of her mortuary insurance premium.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is 57 years old. She is a widow, has 3 children of adult age and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She owns and operates a sari-sari store that has existed for 4 years. She managed to stand on her own two feet after her husband died and is able to provide for the needs of her family. 

Now she has turned the odds in her favor and is making good sales. Nilda is thankful for the financial assistance extended by Paglaum MPC to her. She nurtures her membership making her one of the Members In Good Standing (MIGS). 

Currently she is availing herself of another loan of PHP 10,000 to restock her store with canned goods, milk, sugar, coffee, soy sauce, oil, vinegar, noodles and other items.

loans.use: to restock her store with canned goods, milk, sugar, coffee, soy sauce, oil, vinegar, noodles and other items.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Jhony

texts.es:
Jhony es un pequeño productor de café en Jinotega, Nicaragua. Desde infante ha conocido sobre el manejo de café, esto despertó un interés para la caficultura y hoy a sus 31 años de edad, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia. Está integrado en los procesos de certificación de Fairtrade, lo cual  muestra el buen trabajo que ha realizado en su finca. 

Este es el primer financiamiento directo que recibe, aunque en años anteriores ha recibido financiamiento en insumos los cuales canceló en tiempo y forma. Actualmente está solicitando un financiamiento para asegurar la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que le permitan darle un manejo adecuado a sus plantaciones y obtener mejores rendimientos y calidad en el próximo ciclo de café.

Menciona, que el amor a sus hijos y al trabajo, le ha ayudado a ser más fuerte cada día y a enfrentar los desafíos que se le presentan. Confía que con la gestión de este préstamo, podrá mejorar los rendimientos de su café y por tanto sus ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Jhony is a small coffee producer in Jinotega, Nicaragua. Since he was a child he has learned how to manage the coffee. This ignited his interested in coffee growing and today at 31 years of age he has more than 10 years of experience. He is part of the Fairtrade certification processes, which shows the good work that he is doing on his farm.

This is the first direct funding that he has received, although in previous years he has received financing on supplies which he settled in a timely manner. At the moment he is asking for a loan to finance the purchase of supplies and fertilisers to enable him to properly manage his plantations and to obtain better yield and quality in his next coffee growth cycle.

He mentions that love for his children and work has helped him to be stronger every day and to face the challenges that lie ahead. He is confident that with the management of this loan, he will be able to improve his coffee yield and therefore his income for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilisers for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a hardworking farmer and dedicated mother to her children. She is separated from her husband and lives with her 7 children. She is eager to stand on her own feet knowing she has to sustain the needs of her children. 

She is thankful to Paglaum MPC because through its financial assistance to small-time borrowers like her, she was able to finance her farming needs. 

Just recently she availed herself of a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase bags of fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers and pesticides.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Juan Alexis

texts.es:
Juan Alexis es un productor de café de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Tiene 29 años y vive con su esposa y su hijo. La finca de este pequeño productor es de 3 manzanas la cual cuenta en su totalidad con café. Está integrado a los procesos de certificación de Fairtrade, lo cual evidencia el cumplimiento en el área productiva, social y ambiental en su finca, que ha derivado en el mejoramiento de los rendimientos productivos en los últimos años. 

Juan dice que el café es un rubro rentable, él y su familia viven con los ingresos del café principalmente, y su mayor desafío es hacer frente a las plagas y enfermedades que afectan el café.
 
Para garantizar un manejo adecuado de su cafetal en este año, él está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que aseguren las condiciones requeridas para una buena cosecha. Su dedicación y disciplina le permitirán asegurar la implementación de todas las actividades que requiere su cafetal y continuar mejorando sus ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Alexis is a coffee producer in the northern area of Nicaragua. He is 29 years old and lives with his wife and son. His farm covers 3 blocks which is full of coffee plants. He is integrated into the Fairtrade certification process, which demonstrates compliance in the productive, social and environmental areas on his farm, and which has resulted in improved growth performance in recent years. 

Juan says that coffee is a profitable line of work. He and his family live with the income mainly from coffee and his biggest challenge is to deal with the pests and diseases that affect coffee. To guarantee proper management of his coffee this year, he is asking for a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers that ensure the necessary conditions for a good harvest. His dedication and discipline allow him to ensure the implementation of all of the jobs that his coffee plantation needs and to continue to improve his income for the wellbeing of his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Justo Francisco

texts.es:
Justo tiene 32 años y vive con su esposa en una comunidad de Nicaragua. Desde muy pequeño hacía algunas tareas de la familia en la finca de café de sus padres. Ahora cuenta con su pequeña finca de 3 manzanas de café el cual maneja bajo los estándares de certificación de Fairtrade.

Los rendimientos de café que ha logrado en su finca han sido de 40 quintales pergamino por manzana. Para este ciclo 2015-2016 él requiere un financiamiento para garantizar el mantenimiento de las plantaciones de café y continuar mejorando los rendimientos productivos. En su comunidad lo conocen por ser emprendedor, honesto y responsable. Estas cualidades considera le han ayudado a salir adelante y le permitirán crecer económicamente.
texts.en: Justo is 32 years old and lives with his wife in a community of Nicaragua. From the time he was very young, he would do various family tasks on his parent's coffee farm. Now he has his own small coffee farm that covers 3 blocks, which he manages under the Fairtrade certification standards. The coffee output that he has achieved on his farm has been 40 quintales of Pergamino per block. For this 2015-2016 season, he needs a loan to ensure the maintenance of the coffee plantations and to continue improving the productive output. In his community, he is known for being entrepreneurial, honest and responsible. These qualities have helped him to succeed and allow him to grow economically.

loans.use: to ensure the maintenance jobs of his coffee plantation and to achieve a good harvest.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en:
Felipa is 79 years old, married, and lives in Tipolo, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has owned and operated a rice field for more than 40 years that gives her enough profit to sustain their needs. 

Through the financial assistance extended by Paglaum MPC to small time borrowers like her, she managed to expand her business and bought the neighboring rice field. 

Even though she's aging, she continues her ardent passion for farming and avails another loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase bags of fertilizer for the rice field.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer for the rice field

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es:
Lucio es originario de Nicaragua, vive en una comunidad de Jinotega, con su esposa e hijos. Desde hace más de 20 años cuenta con su pequeña finca de 6 manzanas, de las cuales 2 son de café. En los últimos 3 años su producción de café pergamino ha sido de 60 quintales. Su meta este año, es aumentar su productividad en un 15%, a fin de mejorar los rendimientos productivos del café y hacer frente a los precios bajos del mercado con un mayor volumen. Para esto solicita un financiamiento que le ayude a adquirir los insumos agrícolas que mejoraría la producción de granos de cada planta.
A medida que sus ingresos vayan aumentando, su visión es comprar más terreno para diversificar más su finca con otros rubros como ganado y disminuir los riesgos. Este pequeño empresario rural siempre ha sido muy cuidadoso de invertir los financiamientos que ha recibido en las actividades para las cuales lo solicita y de reinvertir aunque sea una pequeña parte de sus utilidades en su propia finca.
texts.en:
Lucio is originally from Nicaragua. He lives in a community of Jinotega with his wife and children. For more than 20 years, he has had his own small farm covering 6 blocks, two of which are of coffee. In the last 3 years, his Pergamino coffee production has been 60 quintales. His goal this year is to increase his productivity 15%, for the purpose of improving the productive outputs of the coffee and to cope with low market prices with higher volumes. 

To do this, he is asking for a loan to help him get the agricultural supplies that will improve the grain production of each plant. As his income increases, his vision is to buy more land to diversify his farm more with other lines of work such as livestock, and decrease risk. This small rural businessman has always been very careful to invest he funding that he has received into the jobs that he is requesting the loan for, and to reinvest even a small part of his profits in his own farm.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies that will improve his coffee production this season.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 42 years old, married, and lives in Dampalan, Lopez Jaena-Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has been a hog raiser for more than 10 years. This business of hers has sent her children to school and provides for the needs of her family. 

Annie signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and enjoyed financial assistance to small-time hog growers like her. She nurtures her membership, evident to her records of no default payments. 

Recently she availed a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase additional piglets and animal feed for the hog raising business. 

She is looking forward to building a pig pen and a septic tank to ensure good sanitation in her community.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets and animal feed for the hog raising business

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en:
Jesus is 64 years old, a widower, and has five children, four of whom are adult-age; the youngest is still in college. He lives at Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. 

Jesus is known in their place for his fish-selling business. Through this business, he was able to provide for his family's needs. He has been a bonafide member of Paglaum MPC for more than 10 years. 

Recently, he availed a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase materials like bags of cement for a house renovation.

loans.use: to purchase materials like bags of cement for a house renovation

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en:
Brenda is 51 years old, married, and lives in Danao, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is in the fish-selling business with her husband as the fisherman. She earns enough for the needs of her family, considering their increasing expenditures as her children enter college. However, Brenda is still confident that she can continuously provide for her family needs and sustain her business because Paglaum MPC is on her side and willing to provide financial assistance whenever she needs it. 

Recently she availed another loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase additional fish to sell. 

She is hopeful that someday all her hard work will payoff.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Felicisimo

texts.en:
Felicisimo is 83 years old, a widower, has five children of adult age and lives in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. He is a pensioner-member of Paglaum MPC and had enjoyed his membership through its programs and services. 

Felicisimo is thankful for the cooperative because he can always turn to it whenever he needs financial assistance. 

Recently, he availed another loan of PHP 30,000 to pay for medications and purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for medications and purchase maintenance medicines

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en: Lilia is a 56-year-old widow with  9 adult-aged children.  She lives in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She owns and operates several tricycles as a transportation business. She has had the business for 6 years and was financed by Paglaum MPC. She needs a loan to purchase materials to repaint and repair her tricycle for her transportation business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to repaint and repair her tricycle.

loans.name: Romana

texts.en: Romana is a 63-year-old widow from Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She has run this business for 40 years and earns 15,000.00 PHP per month. She has been a member in good standing of Paglaum MPC for  8 years. She requests a loan to purchase avocados, bananas, mangos, and watermelon to sell.

loans.use: to purchase  avocados, bananas, mangos, watermelon, and other fruit to sell.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is a 42-year-old married man who lives in Blancia, Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. He is a full time farmer on his 3.4 hectares rice field. He has educated his children up to college. Romeo recalls that everything was made possible through the financial assistance extended by Paglaum MPC to farmers like him. 

He requests 40,000.00 PHP to pay for labor and purchase bags of fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.use: to pay for labor and purchase bags of fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy biscuits, chocolates, chips, candies, powdered fruit juice and brown sugar

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 47 years old, married and lives in Tangub City. She is a Barangay official and also engages in a retailing business of various consumable items. 

She is thankful because Paglaum MPC is financing her financial needs whether it is for her business, the education of her children or for house repair.

Recently, she availed another loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase sticks, nails, and plywood for house repair.

loans.use: to purchase sticks, nails, and plywood for house repair.

loans.name: Efinita

texts.en:
Efinita is a 58-year-old married woman  who lives in Lawa-an, Aloran-Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She is a snack vendor who displays and delivers various snack foods at a  school to earn 600.00 PHP per day. She is able to meet the needs of her family. 

She requests 4,000.00 PHP to purchase flour, sugar, milk, cheese, butter, oil, and fruit for her snack vending business.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, milk, cheese, butter, oil, and fruit.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is a 69-year-old widow who lives in San Vicente Alto, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She has owned a rice field for 30 years.
