Elle cultive le maïs et le coton sur sa parcelle de 16 hectares, mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de pluie et de matériels agricoles. Cette année, elle a voulu acheter un semoir pour faire le semis et mettre l'engrais simultanément afin de suivre littéralement les méthodes de N'gasènè. L’accès au semoir lui permettra la facilité dans le travail et la rapidité aussi. Matrone espère avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu pouvoir couvrir les frais scolaires des enfants  et construire une maison pour la famille.
texts.en:
Matrone Maïmouna is a farmer registered with myAgro who lives and works in the village of N'Gouraba, southeast of Bamako, Mali. Aged 50, Matrone Maïmouna is the mother of six children aged from 12 to 30 years, of whom six are presently enrolled in school. Agriculture allows her to ensure self-sufficiency for her family, but it is the love of agriculture that moved her to become a farmer. She grows maize and cotton on her plot of 16 hectares, but as a farmer she has to face difficulties such as the lack of rain and of agricultural materials. This year, she wanted to buy a seeding machine to do the sowing and put down fertilizer at the same time, so as to literally follow the methods of N'gasènè. 

Access to the seeder will allow her to facilitate the work and speed it up. Matrone hopes that with the increase in her yields and her income, she will be able to cover school fees for her children and build a house for the family.

loans.use: to buy herself a precision seeder

loans.name: Manuel Salvador

texts.es:
Manuel es un señor con 45 años de edad, dedicado a la venta de mercancía, un negocio el cual inicio hace poco y un medio por el cual ha logrado salir adelante junto con su familia conformada por tres hijos y su esposa.

Actualmente Manuel tiene una gran cantidad de pedidos,  pero no cuenta con un buen capital de trabajo, es por esto que solicita un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de tenis y sandalias. Espera que sus clientes lo sigan buscando por calidad, economía y servicio.

Para este hombre no hay nada imposible, quiere seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño de poder pagarle la educación a sus hijos, pues su bienestar le preocupa.
texts.en:
Manuel is a 45 year old gentleman who sells merchandise, a business he initiated not long ago, and by means of which he has been able to make a go of it, together with his family consisting of a wife and three children.

Currently Manuel has a large number of orders, but lacks working capital. That's why he's requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of tennis shoes and sandals.  He hopes his clients will continue to seek him out due to quality, economy and service. 

For this man nothing is impossible; he wants to keep working in order to achieve his dream of paying for the education of his children, for their well-being concerns him.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of tennis shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov is a rural villager living in Kampong Cham province. She is a 30-year-old, mother of a small child who is still too young to attend school. Nowadays, she grows rice and has worked as a factory worker for more than five years. These businesses earn her about 39,000 KHR per day. 

Her rice crops were not growing well because insects destroyed her fields, which caused deduction in her daily income. Now Pov does not have enough funds to grow her rice paddy fields for this season, so she decided to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy fertilizer to support her farming and increase her rice output. This is the first Kiva loan for her, and she hopes to gain more yields and generates more income through this loan.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her farming and increase her rice output.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Blanca Sonia

texts.es: Doña Blanca de 60 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de leche poliada y también a la venta de sopa de mondongos inicio con capital propio, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas es como puede salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de leche, azúcar, huevos, canela entre otros ingredientes para la elaboración de la leche poliada y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Blanca is 50 years old and for the past ten years has worked selling vanilla custard and tripe soup. She started the business with her own capital. Her business is located close to her house in a very busy area. With what she makes from her sales she manages to get ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy milk, sugar, eggs and cinnamon amongst other ingredients to make her vanilla custard and have greater economic income.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, eggs and cinnamon amongst other ingredients.

loans.name: Salvadora Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Salvadora de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su casa desde hace 10 años ya tiene muchos clientes establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Dona Salvadora is 53 years old.  She lives in her own home with her husband and her daughter.  She works as a travelling vendor selling clothing in the different neighbourhoods that are near her house.  She has been doing this for 10 years and she has many established customers.  With what she earns from her sales she is able to move forward.  

She is requesting a loan to buy more clothing wholesale in order to continue with her sales and thus improve her economic earnings.

loans.use: to buy more clothing wholesale

loans.name: Evar

texts.en:
Evar is a kind guy. He was born in a northern part of Tajikistan in 1984. He is living in small town with his family. He is married and has two children. His wife is a housekeeper and takes cares of their children. He is a cashier. He has worked at private complex for about two years. Before this job he worked four years in the sphere of catering as a cooker and cashier. 

He has applied to get a loan for his daughter’s treatment. He is responsible, honest, and a behaved person. He hopes to be supported by KIVA and awaits your compassion.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter’s treatment.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa continúa con su actividad de fabricación de fuegos artificiales. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de cartón, pólvora, mecha y otros materiales de trabajo. El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque no tuvo problemas en su trabajo. Su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante en la ciudad, situada al oeste del país sobre la meseta altiplánica, Se encuentra a una altitud de 4070 metros sobre el nivel de mar. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Teresa es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposo que se dedica al mismo negocio, viven en un cuarto propio construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la fabricación de fuegos artificiales; estos funcionan como una combinación de petardos y bengalas, generalmente constan de un cartucho, una carga explosiva, y esferas, cubos o cilindros colocadas a su alrededor. Para encenderlos cuentan con una mecha, “iniciamos mi negocio trabajando con mi madre, porque ella conocía la técnica desde hace muchos años atrás y para ayudar a los niños de la calle…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que los fuegos artificiales son muy populares en fiestas populares, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de materiales como; cartón, pólvora, mecheros, tijeras, y otros para las fiestas patrias que se acercan. Su sueño es vender por mayor, ella desea realizar la compra de material para pirotecnia para fabricar fuegos artificiales para las fiestas patrias venideras. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 20 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Teresa solicita un préstamo para la compra de material para fabricar fuegos artificiales para las fiestas patrias venideras para ayudar a los niños de la calle.
texts.en:
Teresa continues with her activity making fireworks. She invested the loan she obtained in buying cardboard, gun powder, wicks and other work materials. She made her payments on time because she had no problems with her work. She sells as a street vendor in the city, located in the western part of the country on the high plains. It is 4,070 meters above sea level and has a cold, dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 0-12 degrees centigrade.

Teresa has dark skin, brown eyes, long, black hair she wears braided, short stature, and a robust build. She dresses in a traditional manner (hat, shawl and skirt). Her mother tongue is Aymará, which she speaks in her family, and she speaks Spanish in the general culture and for her business. She shares her life with her husband, who works at the same business. They live in a home they own built from brick and cement with a metal sheeting roof and a wood floor. It has potable water, electricity, gas, and plumbing. Her business is making fireworks. These function as a combination of fire crackers and sparklers. Generally, they have a casing, an explosive charge, and spheres, cubes or cylinders placed around it. To light them, they have a wick. “We started my business working with my mother, because she knew the technique for several years, and to help street children.” she remarks. The advantage of the business is that fireworks are very popular in public festivals. The disadvantage is a lack of capital to buy materials such as cardboard, gun powder, wicks, scissors, and more for the national festivals which are happening soon. Her dream is to sell wholesale. She wants to buy materials for pyrotechnics to make fireworks for the coming national festivals. This is her second loan cycle with the institution during the 20 years that she has been doing this activity.

These are the reasons that Teresa is asking for a loan to buy material to make fireworks for the coming national festivals to help street children.

loans.use: to buy materials to make fireworks for the coming national festivals to help street children.

loans.name: Arcilia Rosa

texts.en:
Arcilia is 51 years old and lives in the town of Cerete, situated in Cordoba. For the past three years she has run a car-washing business in order to provide for her four children. 

Unfortunately Arcilia’s business is at risk given the violence and lack of safety in her area, but she has no other choice than to carry on working. She would like to take out a small loan of 700,000 COP so as to fix the water pump and refurbish the site, making it larger so as to attract more clients and become more competitive with the other local businesses. 

Arcilia dreams of providing herself and her four children with a brighter future and a nicer home to live in. With your help, this dream can come to fruition!

loans.use: to fix the water pump and refurbish the site

loans.name: Farahnozi

texts.ru:
Фарахнози талантливая девушка. Ей всего 20 лет. Она проживает на районе Файзабад. Фарахнози в свои юные годы набралась хорошего опыта работы и добилась признаний в этой области. У нее большой талант в области шитья женской одежды. Фарахнози уже имеет свою клиентскую базу, и она занята этой деятельность уже 5-ты год. Фарахнози берет за свои услуги примерно 3-4 доллара. Она живет в маленьком районе и жители не имеют возможности платить больше. Фарахнози многим нуждающимся жителям может сшить платье всего за 2 доллара. У нее очень доброе сердце.
  Фарахнози хочет купить швейную машинку (изображенную на фотографии). Ее старая машинка сломалась и ей не обходимо приобрести новую, чтобы не потерять работу. Фарахнози верит, что благодаря KIVA о ее деятельности узнает весь мир, и помогут ей.
texts.en:
Farahnozi is a talented young lady. She is just 20 years old. She lives in the Fayzabad region. Farahnozi has acquired good work experience in her young years and has achieved recognition in her field. She has a great talent in the field of sewing women's clothing. Farahnozi already has her own customer base and she is occupied with this business for over four years. Farahnozi takes about three or four dollars for her services. She lives in a small place, and the residents are not able to pay more. Farahnozi can sew a dress for many needy residents for just two dollars. She has a very kind heart.

Farahnozi wants to buy a sewing machine (depicted in the photograph). Her old sewing machine has broken and she needs to get a new one in order not to lose work. Farahnozi believes that, thanks to Kiva, the whole world will find out about her business and will help her.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
As a parent of two children, Marites works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell frozen foods business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from making peanut butter. Marites is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy frozen foods to sell like ham, hotdogs, etc. for her buy-and-sell frozen foods business.

Marites has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods to sell like ham, hotdogs, etc.

loans.name: Marivel

texts.en:
Marivel is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marivel is 36 years old and has two children who are in school. She has a buy-and-sell household products business in the Philippines. 

Marivel has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like glass, etc. She has been in this business for five years. In the future, Marivel would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like glass, etc.

loans.name: La

texts.en:
La runs a grocery shop. She is living with her husband and two dependent children. Her husband gets up early in the morning every day to do farming, while she prepares her grocery shop.

She needs to stand by in the shop the whole day and needs to consume a lot of energy to run her business until nighttime; however, the car battery is not reliable. Sometimes the battery runs out without notice. She has no choice but to stay in pitch black for one day until morning. This disturbs not only her living lifestyle, but also her business.

Therefore, she is applying for a Kiva loan to buy a solar home system to supply her business’ energy usage and also her family’s usage. With a solar home system, she doesn’t have to be concerned about the power suddenly going off anymore.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system.

location.town: Sampong Village, Thma Andeurk commune, Chetr Borei

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Melanie works hard to support her family. She has a dressed chicken vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Melanie is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more dressed chicken to sell for her dressed chicken vending business.

She successfully repaid her previous loans and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. Melanie has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more dressed chicken to sell.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Заррина благодарит Вас за помощь. Она отремонтировала дом и поставила окна. Но к сожалению ремонт не закончился. Она просит ей помочь купить двери и построить забор вокруг дома. Заррина живет с мамой и дочкой. Она с самой пенсионеры. Заррина дома занимается вязанием, вяжет и продает пинетки. Она трудолюбивая и хочет обустроить свой дом удобным, для семьи. Поддержите Заррину.
texts.en: Zarina thanks you for your help. She fixed up the house and installed windows. But unfortunately the renovations aren't finished. She has requested help to buy doors and to put up a fence around the house. Zarina lives with her mother and daughter. She and her mother are pensioners. Zarina knits, crochets, and sells baby booties. She is hard-working and wants to make her house comfortable for her family. Please support Zarina.

loans.use: to purchase doors and a fence

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell fruits and vegetables business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables.

Salvacion has been in this business for eight years now.

In the future, Salvacion would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing net to sell.

Virginia has been in this business for ten years now.

In the future, Virginia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net to sell.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Melba is 42 years old and has two children who are in school. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

Melba has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Melba would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell dried fish business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy dried fish to sell for her business.

Victoria has been in this business for five years now. In the future, Victoria would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy dried fish to sell for her business.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Myrna works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell beverage business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. Myrna is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy an additional stock of beverages, like Coke, Sprite, etc. to sell in her business.

Myrna has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional stock of beverages, like Coke, Sprite, etc. to sell in her business

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнара, 39 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. С 2010 года она занимается животноводством. На сегодня в хозяйстве имеет 2 коровы, 10 овец. Супруг помогает по хозяйству. Также Гульнара торгует одеждой на рынке. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. В будущем Гульнара хочет и дальше развивать свой бизнес и накопить на приобретение мебели для дома.
texts.en:
Gulnara is 39 years old, married, and the mother of 2 children. She has been raising animals since 2010, and she now has 2 cows and 10 sheep on her farm. Her husband helps her around the farm, and Gulnara also works selling clothing at the market. 

Gulnara has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. In the future, Gulnara wants to develop her business even further, and to save to buy furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Allatisinogo Group

texts.fr: Bintou est une femme âgée de 50 ans mariée mère de 5 enfants elle est une vendeuse de céréale et gérante d’un kiosque depuis 2001. Elle est connu par les détaillants vu son expérience. L’emplacement du kiosque et la disponibilité des céréales sont un atout pour la bonne marche de son activité. Elle veut le prêt pour acheter le maïs, sorgho, riz dans les villages où elle gagne moins cher et les revend aux grossistes. L’utilité du prêt c’est de s’approvisionner en quantité suffisante afin de les revendre et avoir un bénéfice pour s’occuper de sa famille. Elle à déjà reçu le prêt  neuf (9) fois et rembourser aux dates prévues.
texts.en:
Bintou is a woman of 50, a married mother of five children. She is a seller of grains and has had a kiosk (small shop) since 2001. She is well-known by retailers in view of her experience. The location of the kiosk and the availability of the cereals are a trump card for the smooth functioning of her business. 

Bintou wants the loan to buy maize, sorghum, and rice in the villages where she can pay a cheaper price for them and resell them to wholesalers. The utility of the loan is to allow her to stock up on a large enough quantity to resell and make a profit to support her family. She has already received nine loans and has reimbursed them on the due dates.

loans.use: to buy maize, sorghum, and rice for resale

loans.name: Maternidad

texts.en:
Maternidad is married with five children and a member of Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.
   
Maternidad supports the family through her food vending business in the Philippines. She took an Educational loan for her daughter Shermien, 17 years old and the 5th of five children in the family, who is studying for her Bachelor of Science in Education and is currently in the first year of this 4-year course.

Maternidad is borrowing 13,407 PHP to pay the tuition fees of her daughter Shermien for the first semester of the school year 2015-2016.

When she graduates, Shermien plans  to help her parents earn an income.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for her daughter

loans.name: Ronessa

texts.en:
Ronessa is 37 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, Ronessa works very hard to provide for them.

Ronessa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like sugar, noodles, home care products, and other groceries.

Ronessa has been in this business for three years. 

In the future, Ronessa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, noodles, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Damira

texts.ru: Дамира успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 20 овец, 4 лошади. Дамира по-прежнему работает в школе. Она любит свое дело и неустанно инвестирует в него. Дамира вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 дойных коров для увеличения объемов реализации экологически-чистого молока. Доходы от кредита Дамира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и ремонт ее дома.
texts.en: Damira successfully repaid her loan, which she used for its intended purpose. She is grateful to Kiva and to all who helped to finance her. Today on her farm she has four cows, twenty sheep, and four horses. Damira used to work at a school. She loves her work and is constantly investing in it. Damira has again applied for loan of 150,000 KGS from Bai Tushum Bank to buy four dairy cows and thereby increase her production of organic milk. Damira plans to invest her income from the loan in the further development of her livestock herds and the renovation of her house.

loans.use: to buy 4 dairy cows to sell more organic milk

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a smallholder farmer who lives and works on a small farmland in the Cherengany area of Kenya. She makes a living doing dairy and horticultural farming. She enjoys her job as a farmer because it provides food, income, and a livelihood for her family. Besides farming being a means of securing the basic necessities for life, she finds self-respect and fulfillment knowing that what she does feeds her nation.

In the area of Kenya where Alice operates, there is a huge deficit in terms of access to financial products and services. For years, Alice has had yields and incomes that are far below what they could be because she can't afford quality agricultural inputs. Juhudi Kilimo partnered with KIVA to provide financial services to smallholders around Kenya. Through this partnership, financial services are now available to farmers like Alice. She is seeking a loan to buy important agricultural inputs ahead of the planting season. These farm inputs include seeds, fertilizer, herbicides and pesticides. 

Your loan will enable her to improve her production through use of quality farm inputs. This intervention will help her fill the increasing demand for food in the market and, in the process, generate more income to repay the loan debt and elevate the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Delfina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Delfina es una pequeña emprendedora de 58 años, que vive con su esposo y sus hijos en su pequeña finca en una comunidad rural al norte de Nicaragua. Junto a su familia se dedica a la caficultura, rubro en el que lleva más de 20 años y ha logrado aumentar hasta en un 50% la producción de su pequeña finca de 7 manzanas, gracias al buen manejo nutricional que ha dado a su plantación.

Para seguir manteniendo este rubro, ella ha decidido mejorar continuamente la nutrición de sus plantas,  para ello solicita un financiamiento para la compra de los fertilizantes y abonos recomendados por los técnicos que le brindan asistencia.

Este plan de mejoramiento nutricional dará como resultado plantas más productivas, lo cual le permitirá tener mayores ingresos para mejorar las condiciones socio-económicas de su  familia.
texts.en:
Delfina is a small business woman, aged 58, who lives with her husband and their children on a small farm in a rural community in the north of Nicaragua. Together with her family she grows coffee. She's been in this line of work for more than 20 years and has achieved up to a 50% increase in production on their small 7 manzana [12.2 acre] farm, due to good management of crop nutrition on the plantation. 

In order to continue in this line of work, she has decided to continually improve crop nutrition. That's why she's requesting a loan in order to buy the fertilizers and manure recommended by those who offer technical assistance. 

This plan to improve crop nutrition will result in more productive plants, which will allow for greater income and improvement in the socioeconomic condition of her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and manure to apply to her coffee plants.

loans.name: Mayram

texts.en:
This is Mayram. She is 46, married, a mother of one child. She is very kind woman and works hard in developing her farm. She has been involved in this activity for six years. Her husband always helps to her and they work together for the good future of their child. 

Through the requested loan, Mayram is intending to buy special seeds of vegetables and mineral fertilizers to develop her business. She is planning to expand her agriculture sector with a wide variety of seeds and productions. Mayram hopes that her beloved family will stay in good health and secured environment.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: Dora de 46 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad y vive con su esposo y sus cinco hijos de los cuales tres están trabajando y aportan a la economía familiar. Ella es una mujer tenaz que se gana la vida gracias a su trabajo en un centro de nutrición infantil, además su esposo también aporta a los gastos familiares por medio de su trabajo en una cooperativa de transporte. Dora con el propósito de hacer algunas reparaciones muy necesarias en su vivienda tales como: reparar la pila y comprar una puerta  solicito un crédito anteriormente el cual le sirvió de gran ayuda para poder  repara la pila para agua, debido a su buena experiencia ella ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI  para continuar con las mejoras de su vivienda esta vez en lo que respecta a remodelar su cuarto baño el cual con el paso del tiempo se ha ido deteriorando, con el monto piensa comprar: ladrillo, cemento, arena, etc.
texts.en: Dora, 46 years old, lives in a house she owns and lives with her husband and their five children of whom three are working and contribute to the family economy. She is a tenacious woman who earns her living thanks to her work in a child nutrition center, in addition her husband also contributes to the family expenses through his work in a transportation cooperative. Dora, with the goal of doing some very necessary repairs to her house such as repairing the large outdoor water basin and purchase a door, previously asked for a loan which served as a great help to be able to repair the basin. Due to her good experience, she has decided to ask for another loan from FUSAI to continue with the home improvements, this time related to remodeling her bathroom which, with the passing of time, has deteriorated. With this amount, she plans to purchase brick, cement, sand, etc.

loans.use: to invest in brick, cement, sand, etc.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 38 years old, married and had two children attending to school. To gain income and sustain his family's needs, he provide motorcycle transport business in their village. His wife also raise hogs to sell as additional source of income. 

He wants to improve his profits due to increasing demands of his family especially for education expenses. He is now asking for a loan of Php.10,000 to buy gasoline for the motorcycle and hogs to raise. He hopes to continue providing good education to his children.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and hogs to raise

loans.name: Elmie

texts.en:
Elmie is 50 years old, married and has two children.  

She is in the agricultural business farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Elmie requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.  Elmie has been farming sugarcane for 15 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elmie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Githunguri United Women Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand holding a cheque in the photo is Leah; 57 years old, married and a mother of five children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in year 2013 to benefit from training especially on enterprise development. 

She does vegetable farming like kale, cabbage, onions and tomatoes. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer, hence to boost production. With increased profits, she will be able to pay school fees for her children.

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support. She promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizer, to boost vegetable production and earn more income to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Mzia

texts.en:
Mzia is 43 years old and she lives in Sagarejo with her 2 children and pensioner father. Mzia works as a nurse and gets a monthly income. She wants to start an additional business in order to increase her income. 

The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables her to get a loan. With the loan she will purchase a stock of linens at wholesale prices and will resell among her co-workers and neighbors. Mzia is very motivated to have increased stable income to improve the living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to begin trade linens

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a small holder farmer from the countryside who is very hard-working, honest and humble. She has worked in the fields since she was a tiny girl. She acquired experience, thanks to the teachings of her loving parents. 

Susan lives together with her family in Bomet, Kenya. She keeps dairy cows and poultry at her farm, and her primary source of income is milk and eggs. She makes extra money through a side hustle small business. Susan is seeking a loan to purchase poultry. She enjoys raising chickens. She has been to training that have empowered her to take calculated business risks. 

With your loan, Susan will be able to expand the poultry section on her farm. This will generate enough income to repay the loan, and she will also be able to save extra. Susan is very concerned about her children’s education; profits that will be acquired from the poultry will go to her children’s school fees.
Lend to this enterprising Kenyan mum!

loans.use: To purchase poultry

loans.name: Socima

texts.en:
Socima is 58 years old and has ten children.  Socima is married and has two children who are in school.

She is in the agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. Socima requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other livestock to sell.
Socima has been raising livestock for 1 year now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Socima would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other livestock to sell

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: José de 35 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 16, 15, 13  y 11 años de edad. Él es un hombre emprendedor que ha aprendido varios oficios para poder sacar a delante a su familia. Entre los trabajos que realiza están pesca la cual realiza tres veces por semana, carpintería a domicilio y en  reparaciones y elaboración de camas y juegos de comedor por temporadas, también se desempeña como albañil y es así como el realizando esta variedad de actividades obtiene sus ingresos que le han ayudado a sostener la economía de su hogar. José anteriormente solicito un crédito con el cual pudo instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda por lo cual se encuentra muy agradecido y con ganas de continuar mejorando su casa, es por ello que solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para pode construir una pila para almacenar agua para el uso diario de su hogar, y al mismo tiempo comenzar la construcción de un cuarto baño el cual le brinde mayor privacidad a la hora de realizar su aseo personal. Por lo anterior con el monto otorgado comprara: cemento, arena, ladrillo, etc.
texts.en: José, 35 years old, lives with his wife and their four children, ages 16, 15, 13, and 11. He is an enterprising man who has learned various trades to be able to get his family ahead. Among the jobs that he does is fishing, which he does three times per week, home carpentry and repairing and making beds and dining room sets seasonally, and he also works as a construction worker. This is how, doing these jobs, he gets his income which helps him to sustain the household economy. José previously asked for a loan with which he was able to install electricity in his house, for which he is very grateful and has desires to continue improving his house. For this, he asks for another loan from FUSAI to be able to build a large outdoor water basin to store water to use daily in his house, and at the same time to begin to build the bathroom, which will offer more privacy when taking care of personal hygiene. For this, with the amount granted, he will purchase cement, sand, brick, etc.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, bricks, etc.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Doña Rosario de 67 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 30 años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal, con lo que obtienen de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, maíz y mejorar el local cambiando las laminas y la tela metálica para tener un mejor ambienta para sus clientes y asi poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en: Rosario, 67 years old, lives in her own house with her son. She has worked for 30 years making and selling pupusas. Her business is located in the municipal market. With what she earns from her sales, she manages to cover some of the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase pork rind, quesillo, beans, corn and improve the space, replacing the metal sheeting and the wire mesh to have a better environment for her customers and, so, to be able to continue with her work which generates a good income.

loans.use: to purchase pork rind, quesillo, beans, corn and to improve the space replacing the metal sheeting and the wire mesh.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Erlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store.  

Erlinda is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy spare parts and other materials needed for her bicycle transport business.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other materials.

loans.name: Srey's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager living in Kampong Cham province, Srey is a 43-year-old, mother of three children, and only one of them is in school. Growing rice, depending on rain, has been the main source of her family’s income for 25 years. Harvesting on her co-villager’s farm for fee is an additional source of her income to complement her family’s need. Rice drought is the main obstacle for her in rice farming business. 

Srey has been with VisionFund for three cycles already and completely paid back the loans. Through those loans, her family’s standard of living has improved. Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group to apply for a new loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer to grow her rice fields and increase productivity of her crops. She hopes to earn more income and ability to buy a motorbike to drive her from home to her farm.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to grow her rice fields and increase productivity of her crops.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Ayzharkyn

texts.ru: Айжаркын, 32 года, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Образование - среднее. Уже много лет она занимается животноводством. Благодаря ее непосильному труду и емкой работе, Айжаркын достигла больших успехов в развитии хозяйства и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 23,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Айжаркын имеется 3 коровы и 30 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Ayzharkyn is 32 years old, married, and has three children. She has a secondary education. She has been rearing animals for many years. Thanks to her great efforts and much work, Ayzharkyn has achieved great success in developing her farm and has begun to get a monthly profit of 23,000 som (KGS). Today Ayzharkyn has three cows and 30 sheep. In order to develop her business further, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep to increase her flock. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep in order to increase her flock.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Doña Rosa, tiene 64 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos y vive junto a su esposo en un sector del municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Hace 15 años que se dedica al comercio para obtener sus propios ingresos y ha puesto una pulpería donde vende manteca, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, maiz, refrescos, productos de limpieza, condimentos etc. Ella ha invertido varios prestamos a su negocio, actualmente solicita el séptimo ciclo a la institución y es por 10,000 lempiras, con el cual va surtir  mas productos como refrescos, churros, granos básicos, pan, huevos, productos de aseo, etc. Con este préstamo piensa aumentar sus ventas e ingresos. Su meta sigue siendo ver en crecimiento su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Rosa, 64, is married, has 3 children and lives with her husband in an area in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. She's had her commercial business for 15 years in order to obtain her own earnings and has a store where she sells butter, sugar, rice, beans, refreshments, cleaning products, condiments, etc. She has invested many loans into her business and is now requesting her 7th loan from the institution for 10,000 lempiras, with which she will stock up on products, like refreshments, churros (fried dough with sweet filling), basic grains, bread, eggs, hygiene products, etc. With this loan, she hopes to increase her sales and income. Her goal continues to be to grow her business and improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: buy refreshments, churros (fried dough with sweet filling), basic grains, bread, eggs, hygiene products and other items.

loans.name: Eulalie

texts.fr:
33 ans, mariée, Eulalie est une couturière très talentueuse et perfectionniste. Elle est mère de deux enfants de 11 et 12 ans, tous scolarisés dans une école privée.
Au début, ou plus précisément depuis 2003 jusqu'au 2008, elle était couturière de mode, et après jusqu'à maintenant, elle se spécialise dans la couture de couvres lit et oreillers, coussins, draps et housses. Elle a beaucoup de clients, sa bonne attitude commerciale est un grand atout pour attirer des clients et elle cherche toujours à améliorer ses œuvres et son affaire.
La famille possède déjà sa propre maison mais son désir est de faire de l'extension et quelques réhabilitation.
texts.en:
Eulalie, 33 years old and married, is a very talented seamstress quite a perfectionist. She is the mother of two children of 11 and 12, both enrolled in a private school. In the beginning, or more precisely from 2003 to 2008, she did tailoring of fashionable clothing. 

After that and until now, she has specialized in sewing bed spreads and pillows, cushions, sheets and pillow cases. She has lots of clients, her good business attitude being a big trump in attracting customers, and she is always looking to improve her work and her business. Her family already has their own house, but she would like to extend it and do some refurbishment.

loans.use: to buy cloth, sponge filling, lining, zippers, and bags

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 43 years old, married and a mother of 6 children; She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2014 so as to benefit from trainings especially enterprise development. 

She practices mixed farming; she grows assorted vegetables i.e. kale, cabbages and onions and also keeps a dairy cow. She is applying Kiva loan to buy dairy feeds hence improve dairy production for increased income. This will enable her provide better clothing and food to her family. 

Ruth is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support. She promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: To buy dairy feeds to improve dairy production for more increased income to provide better clothing and food to her family.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 12 años a la siembra de maíz y maicillo sus padres le ayudan en las siembras y cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder recoger una buena cosecha y tener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: The young woman whose face has been pixelated because she is 28 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has worked for the past 12 years growing corn and sorghum. Her parents help her with the planting and when her harvest is ready, she stores in in the granaries shown in the photograph. She is asking for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc. to be able to have a good harvest and good earnings.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y su hijo en el caserío San Nicolas que pertenece al distrito de Zaña que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Jose Luis se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde hace más de 7 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Jose Luis espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 30 years old, in a common-law marriage, lives with his spouse and his child in the village of San Nicolas, which is part of Zaña district, which is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. Life in the community is peaceful and the people work primarily in commerce and raising small animals.

Jose Luis works offering transportation services for passengers in his vehicle (a motorcycle taxi), work that he has done for more than 7 years. He has experience in the sector and has very good personal and work references in the zone. The loan will be used to make repairs and do some maintenance on his vehicle, which is currently in bad condition. With this, Jose Luis hopes to offer better service to his customers, which will generate more income, with the end of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to make some repairs and do maintenance on his vehicle since it is currently in bad condition.

loans.name: Ma. Cecilia Maricyl

texts.en:
Ma. Cecilia Maricyl is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old and has three children who are in school. She has a food market business in the Philippines. 

Ma. Cecilia Maricyl has requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy dressed chicken, fish, meat, etc. to sell in her business. She has been in this business for three years. In the future, Ma. Cecilia Maricyl would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy dressed chicken, fish, meat, etc. to sell in her business.

loans.name: Ratkan

texts.ru: Раткан, 60 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. У нее высшее образование, работает учителем в двух школах, в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством, начав свой бизнес 20 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Раткан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, овца. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 23,000 сом (KGS). От сильного ветра с крыши сараев для скота снесло крышу, поэтому Раткан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для восстановления крыши сараев. Свои доходы Раткан планирует вкладывать в развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Ratkan is 60 years old and married with four children. She has a university education and works as a teacher at two schools. In order to earn extra money for her family, she also breeds livestock - a business she started 20 years ago. Thanks to her persistent work Ratkan now has two cows and several sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is around 23,000 KGS. High winds destroyed the roof of the barn where the animals live, so Ratkan applied for a loan of 150,000 KGS from Bai Tushum Bank to purchase construction materials to repair the roof. Ratkan plans to invest her income in the development of her business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to restore the roof of her barn

loans.name: Noel Feliciano

texts.es:
Noel tiene 43 años y es un pequeño productor de café que vive en una comunidad al norte de Nicaragua. Vive con su esposa e hijos en una finca de 3 manzanas de café, el cual maneja bajo los criterios de certificación de Comercio Justo.

Noel explica que en los últimos años la producción de su café ha pasado de 20 a 35 quintales pergamino por manzana, pero que su expectativa para el futuro es mejorar los rendimientos. Para lograr esta meta, él está solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar los insumos y fertilizantes que requiere su plantación, y lograr así una mejor cosecha. Su deseo es aumentar sus ingresos y con ello poder brindar a su familia mejores condiciones para su futuro.
texts.en:
Noel is 43 years old.  He is a small coffee producer who lives in a community in northern Nicaragua.  He lives with his wife and children on a coffee farm of 3 “manzanas” [a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters or 1.740 acres] which he manages under the Fair Trade certification criteria. 

Noel explains that in the last years his production of pergamino coffee has gone from 20 to 35 “quintales” [a quintal is 46 kg or about 100 pounds] per manzana.  His expectation for the future is to improve this output.  To achieve this goal, he is requesting a loan to buy the supplies and fertilizers that his plantation needs to achieve an improved harvest.  His wish is to increase his income and with that be able to offer his family better conditions for the future.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers that will allow him to have a successful coffee harvest

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: Rene tiene 21 años vive en una comunidad del departamento de Atlántida en Honduras,  y, a pesar de ser tan  joven  es muy independiente y  tiene  claros sus objetivos en la vida, está estudiando en la universidad y trabaja en el negocio de su familia como gerente de una tienda donde se vende suministros para la agricultura y ganadería. El aspira a finalizar su carrera universitaria y algún día llegar a tener su propio negocio. Rene sabe que a la tienda  donde trabaja llegan muchos agricultores y personas que viven en lugares sin acceso a energía eléctrica por lo cual quiere contribuir al mejoramiento de la vida de estas personas. A través del financiamiento que solicita a Soluz Honduras el estará suministrándoles Sistemas Solares portátiles para que tengan acceso a iluminación y comunicación y además   con los ingresos que le genere esta venta podrá   costear parte de sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Rene is 21 years old and lives in the Atlántida department of Honduras, Despite being very young he is very independent and has clear objectives in his life. He is studying at university and works in the family business as the manager of a store that sells supplies for farming and livestock raising. He hopes to complete his university studies and one day have his own business.

Rene knows that a lot of farmers and others that live in places with no electricity come to the store he works in and he wants to contribute to improving the lives of these people. With the financing he is requesting from Soluz Honduras he will be distributing portable solar energy systems so they have access to lighting and communication. Plus with the income that he generates he can pay part of the cost of his university expenses.

loans.use: to distribute portable solar energy systems in communities with no access to electricity.

loans.name: Gulnigor

texts.ru: Гулнигору 35 лет. Она мать четверых детей. Ее муж работает водителем, а Гулинигор дома работает швей. Она на дому принимает заказы. Для нее это очень удобная работа. Она может заниматься домашними делами и зарабатывать. Гулиногор с мужем решили отремонтировать дом. Для этого нужно купить стройматериалы. Гулиниго сама обратилась за кредитом, потому что МДО "Хумо" упрощает процессы кредитования и предлагает выгодные условия для женщин. Гулнигор не сомневается, что ей помогут, и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en: Gulnigor is 35 years old. She is the mother of four children. Her husband works as a driver, and Gulnigor works from home as a seamstress. She takes orders at home. It is very convenient work for her. She can do the household chores and earn money. Gulnigor and her husband have decided to renovate their house. They need to buy construction materials for this. Gulnigor has applied for a loan herself because MLO Humo simplifies the loan processes and offers attractive conditions for women. Gulnigor does not doubt that she will be helped, and thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and renovate her house.

loans.name: Smile Always -N51Minh Thắng Group

texts.en:
Mrs Liên is 34 years old and she is married.  She has had a manufacturing business sewing clothes for more than 10 years.
Liên lives in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover this region often suffered by natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea. 
The main hardship that Liên faces is lack of capital.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more cloth and equipment to do tailoring service.
In 2009, Liên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Liên has successfully repaid 7 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profit, Liên hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to maintain  a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth and equipment to do tailoring service

loans.name: Aiymbu

texts.ru: Айымбу, 61 год, замужем, мать 3 детей, младшему сыну- 16 лет, он живет с родителями. У Айымбу среднее образование, на протяжении 38 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 1 корова, 2 лошади и 10 овец. На 2,72 Га земли она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет до 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айымбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычка для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ее бизнеса и постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en: Aiymbu is 61 years old, married, and the mother of three children. Her youngest son is 16 years old and lives with his parents. Aiymbu has a secondary education. She has been rearing animals and growing crops for 38 years. She has one cow, two horses and ten sheep. She grows barley on 2.72 hectares of land. Her monthly profit is up to 11,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Aiymbu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to buy a steer for fattening and resale. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in increasing her business further and in building livestock barns.

loans.use: to buy a steer for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en:
Ma. Luz is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Luz is 56 years old and has one child in school.

Ma. Luz has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines. Ma. Luz requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed like bamboo sticks, nipa leaves, etc..

Ma. Luz has been in this business for 35 years. In the future, Ma. Luz would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed like bamboo sticks, nipa leaves, etc.

loans.name: Jose Antonio Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo de 29 años de edad vive casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 3 años y medio de edad. Él es un hombre muy trabajador que se gana la vida de pescando tres días por semana, los días restantes los invierte en el cuido y recolección de sus cultivos de plátano y chile dulce, los cuales luego los vende a un buen precio. Eduardo  anteriormente solicito un crédito con el cual inicio el cambio del techo de su vivienda pero debido a que el monto le fue insuficiente para hacer el cambio por completo, el solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI  para comprar lámina galvanizada, clavos, alambre y madera para poder continuar con el cambio de lamina de su humilde hogar y de esta manera proteger sus pocas pertenencias de las filtraciones de agua que se le presentan en épocas de lluvia.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 29 years old, lives in his own home with his life partner and their 3 and a half year old son. He is a hard working man who earns a living fishing three days per week. He invests the rest of his days in caring for and harvesting his plantain and sweet chili crops. He then sells these for a good price. 

Eduardo previously requested a loan with which he started to replace the roof of his home. Due to the amount being insufficient for completing the replacement, he is requesting a new loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheet metal, nails, wire and wood in order to continue replacing the sheet metal on his humble home. In this way he can protect his few belongings from the water leakage which happens during the rainy season.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, nails, wire and wood in order to continue replacing the sheet metal on his humble home.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha continúa con su actividad de panadería. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de una máquina amasadora de pan, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque no tuvo problemas. Ya pasó más de un año de su anterior préstamo y ahora tiene 37 años. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona sur de la ciudad, considerada zona peri urbana. Creada debido a un desborde del río, en la que más de 3000 familias quedaron sin hogar, y con las pocas pertenencias que llevaban tuvieron que asentarse en unos terrenos baldíos, para empezar una nueva vida.  De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Martha es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro rizado, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al mismo negocio y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de cemento que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la panadería, las variedades de panes más comunes son; Cuñapé (Pequeño bollo hecho de harina de yuca con queso), Empanada de arroz (Horneado de arroz y queso), Zonzo (Puré de yuca mezclado con queso y formado en un palito), Bizcochos de trigo (Bollitos duros de harina de trigo), Masaco de plátano (Plátano de freír aplastado y mezclado con queso, cerdo o charque de res),  Masaco de yuca (Yuca hervida y aplastada mezclada con queso o trocitos de cerdo o charque de res),  y otros, “continúo expandiendo mi panadería, mi antiguo horno esta defectuoso y es pequeño la demanda de la zona me exige un horno nuevo y más grande…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas diarias, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de un horno de 6 latas para reponer el anterior horno defectuoso y para cumplir con la demanda de la zona. Su sueño es tener una tienda propia, ella desea realizar la compra de un horno industrial con capacidad para 6 latas. Esta es la 7 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Martha solicita un préstamo para la compra de un horno industrial con capacidad para 6 latas para cumplir con la demanda de la zona.
texts.en:
Martha continues with her bakery business. The loan that she got was invested in the purchase of a bread mixing machine. The loan payments were punctual because she had no problems. It has been more than a year since her previous loan and now she is 37 years old. Her business is in the southern area of the city, an area considered to be periurban. It was created due to a river flooding, in which more than 3000 families were left homeless, and with the few belongings that they carried away, they had to squat on some empty land to begin a new life. It has a warm sub-tropical climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 21-35 degrees centigrade. 

Martha has dark skin, brown eyes, curly black hair, is short, and has a thin physique. Her native language is Guaraní, which she speaks in the area and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the business she does. She shares her life with her partner who works in the same business and with her children who go to school. They live in a rented room built of brick and cement with a roof of metal sheeting and a cement floor which has running water, electricity, and sewer services. Her business is a bakery, the most common varieties of bread are: cuñapé (a small roll made with yucca flour and cheese), empanada de arroz (baked with rice and cheese), zonzo (yucca puree mixed with cheese and made into a stick), bizcochos de trigo (small hard rolls of wheat flour), masaco de plátano (fried plantains mashed and mixed with cheese, pork or salted beef), masaco de yuca (boiled and mashed mixed with cheese or pork or salted beef), and more. "I continue expanding my bakery. My old oven is defective and is small. The demand in the zone makes me need a new and larger oven..." she says. The advantage of her business is that it has daily sales. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to purchase an oven with six racks. This is her 7th loan cycle with the institution in the 8 years that she has worked in this business. 

For these reasons, Martha asks for a loan to purchase an industrial oven with capacity for 6 racks to meet with the demand in the zone.

loans.use: to purchase a large industrial oven to meet the demand in the zone.

loans.name: Fransisco

texts.es:
El socio Fransisco continua dedicándose a la  venta de yeso y le va excelente, el socio lleva buen tiempo en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El agradece infinitamente a todos los inversionistas que le apoyaron con el préstamo y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas establecidas.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de yeso entre otros.
texts.en:
Fransisco continues working selling gypsum and it is going excellently. The member has been in this business for a good while, which is going well for him thanks to the determination he puts each day into his business. The member is a responsible and determined person. The member wants to continue working so that, in this way, to continue supporting his family.

He is infinitely grateful to all the investors who supported him with the loan and promises to make the established payments.

The member asks for the loan to purchase gypsum and more.

loans.use: to purchase gypsum and more.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es:
Susan es una mujer de 29 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 4 hijos de 4, 6, 8 y 12 años, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, decidida, generosa, constante, fuerte, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona Sur de la ciudad, caracterizada por una intensa actividad económica que generó el asentamiento de los mercados más grandes de innumerables galerías y locales comerciales. De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Susan es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello largo negro rizado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al mismo negocio y con sus hijos; los 3 mayores estudian en la escuela y el menor aún no se encuentra en edad escolar, viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de cemento que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional como; majadito (carne deshidratada, arroz, huevo frito y plátano frito), locro (sopa de: carne deshidratada, carne cortada en pedacitos, yuca y huevo), arroz con queso (arroz, leche y queso), y otros, actividad que realiza en un cuarto de su casa habilitado como cocina y en las afueras del lugar al aire libre habilitado como comedor, “venimos trabajando y avanzando de a poco, comenzamos con nuestros utensilios caseros y la demanda nos exige mejorar nuestros utensilios…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas son diarias, la desventaja es la falta de un horno industrial e utensilios de cocina para preparar mayor cantidad y variedad de comida. Su sueño es tener un lugar amplio donde poder trabajar, ella desea realizar la compra de un horno industrial y algunos utensilios de cocina como ollas y sartenes. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Susan solicita un préstamo para la compra de un horno industrial e utensilios de cocina para cocinar mayor cantidad y variedad de comida.
texts.en:
Susan, 29, lives with her partner, has 4 children aged 4, 6, 8 y 12 years and her business is preparing and selling traditional dishes.

She is a good mother, enterprising, decided, generous, constant, strong, responsible and hard-working. She runs her business in the southern area of the city, which has intense commercial activity because of the establishment of the largest markets and innumerable galleries and commercial locales. The climate is warm and subtropical with a temperature that varies between 21 and 35 degrees Centigrade in the daytime.

Susan has a dark complexion, brown eyes, long, curly, black hair, is short, robust and her mother tongue is guaraní, which is spoken in the area and for general cultural reasons and her business, she speaks Spanish. She shares her life with her partner who also runs the same business and her children; three are school aged and the other is too young for school. They live in a rented room built of bricks and cement with a calamine roof and cement floor, they have potable water, plumbing and electricity. Their business is preparing and selling traditional dishes, like mojadito (dehydrated meat, rice, fried egg and banana), loco (a soup made of dehydrated meat, pieces of cut meat, yuca and egg), rice and cheese (rice, milk and cheese), and other dishes that they prepare in a room in their house outfitted as a kitchen and outside is outfitted as a dining area. “We've been working and moving forward slowly, we started with our own utensils and now the demand for utensils is greater and we need more..." she comments. The advantage of this business is that the sales happen daily , but the disadvantage is that they need an industrial oven and kitchen utensils to prepare a greater quantity and variety of food. Her dream is to have a large area to work in. She'd like to buy an industrial oven and some kitchen utensils, like pots and pans. This is her 1st loan with the institution since running her business for 5 years.

For these reasons, Susan is requesting a loan to buy an industrial oven and kitchen utensils so she can prepare a greater quantity and variety of food.

loans.use: buy an industrial oven and kitchen utensils in order to cook a greater quantity and variety of food.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase wheat, corn and quinoa.

loans.name: Kulumkan

texts.ru: Кулумкан, 52 года, замужем, мать 4 детей, самому младшему - 12 лет. У Кулумкан среднее образование, она на протяжении 31 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 13 коров, 20 овец. На участке мерою 12,0 Га она выращивает ячмень для реализации. На ежедневнгой основе сдает молоко местному молокозаводу. Ежемесячный совокупный доход Кулумкан составляет около 16,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 бычков для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита позволят Кулумкан развить ее бизнес, нарастить активы и запастись сеном для скота.
texts.en: Kulumkan is 52 years old, married, and the mother of four children, the youngest of whom is 12 years old. Kulumkan has a secondary education. She has been rearing animals and growing crops for 31 years. Today she has 13 cows and 20 sheep. She grows barley for sale on a 12.0 hectare plot of land. She gives milk to the local dairy on a daily basis. Kulumkan's gross monthly income is about 16,000 som (KGS). She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy four steers for fattening and resale. The proceeds of the loan will enable Kulumkan to develop her business, grow her assets and stock up on hay for her livestock.

loans.use: to buy four steers for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Topchukan

texts.ru: Топчукан, 47 лет, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей. У нее - средне-специальное образование, работает в школе библиотекарем. В качестве дохода для своей семьи также она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Топчукан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 корова, 10 овец. На 1,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Топчукан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и нетели. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и ремонт дома.
texts.en: Topchukan is 47 years old, married, and raising four children. She has a vocational education. She works in a school as a librarian. She also rears animals and grows crops to get income for her family. Thanks to Topchukan's hard work, today she has one cow and ten sheep. She grows barley on 1.0 hectares of rented land. Her gross monthly profit is about 20,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Topchukan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow and heifer. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her number of domestic livestock and in renovating her house.

loans.use: to buy a cow and heifer in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Gulniso

texts.ru: Гулнисо очень старательная женщина. Ей 30 лет и она замужем. Гулнисо жительница города Турсунзаде. Её муж работает таксистом. Сама Гулнисо занимается шитьем женской одежды. Научиться этому ей было нелегко. После окончания средней школы из-за финансовых проблем её родители не смогли дать ей высшего образования, но они хотели, чтобы их дочь стала независимой и нашла свой путь в жизни. Так как у неё был талант к шитью, ее родители решили отдать её на курсы шитья, однако у них было мало средств и на это тоже. Через несколько месяцев накопив определенную сумму, они смогли оплатить курс обучения Гулнисо. Она стала отличной портнихой и стала помогать родителям. После замужества она продолжала работу. Сейчас Гулнисо хочет расширить свой бизнес и для этого ей необходимо купить новую швейную машинку "Ямата". Она нуждается в финансовой поддержке. Пожалуйста, помогите Гулнисо осуществить свою мечту. Спасибо.
texts.en: Gulniso is a very industrious woman. She is 30 years old and married. Gulniso is a resident of the town of Tursun-zoda. Her husband works as a taxi driver. Gulniso herself sews women's clothing. It was hard for her to learn how to do this. After graduating from secondary school, her parents were unable to give her a higher education due to financial problems, but they wanted their daughter to become independent and find her own path in life. Since she had a talent for sewing, her parents decided to send her on sewing courses, however they had few funds for this too. Having saved up the specified sum over a few months, they were able to pay for Gulniso's training. She became an excellent seamstress and began helping her parents. She continued working after getting married. Now Gulniso wants to expand her business and she needs to buy a new "Yamata" sewing machine for this. She needs financial support. Please help Gulniso to realize her dream. Thank you.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 40 años de edad, conviviente, vive en el distrito de Cayaltí con su cónyugue, comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a la fabricación de productos metálicos como puertas, ventanas, objetos de metal, con más de 3 años de experiencia, su negocio se encuentra ubicado al costado de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de productos metálicos para abastecerse de mayor materia prima y asi poder atender los pedidos pendientes que tiene, lo que permitirá aumentar sus ingresos, mejorando sus ganancias y por consecuente la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 40 years old, in a common-law relationship, and lives with his partner in the district of Cayaltí, a community of agriculture, trade, and cattle, located in the Province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque Region, on the north coast of Peru.

He works in the production of metal products like doors, windows, metal objects, and has more than 3 years of experience. His business is located at the side of his house. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for the purchase of metallic products to stock up on more raw material and thus be able to fulfill the orders he has pending, which will allow him to augment his income, improving his earnings and consequently his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: buy metallic products to stock up on more raw material.

loans.name: Gerly

texts.en:
Gerly is 45 years old and has eight children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

She is in the agricultural business, doing pig fattening in the Philippines. Gerly requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Gerly has been pig fattening for 15 years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gerly would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Josefina is 49 years old and has one child in school.

Josefina has a buy-and-sell household product business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like plates, etc. 

Josefina has been in this business for 30 years. In the future, Josefina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy household items to sell like plates, etc

loans.name: Leoniza

texts.en:
Leoniza is 21 years old and married with two children. Leoniza works very hard to provide for them.

Leoniza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, home care products, and other groceries.

Leoniza has been in this business for two years. In the future, Leoniza would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Adelmo

texts.es:
Adelmo es un agricultor de 54 años que se dedica a la producción de café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser: Comercio justo y Rain Forest bajo la supervisión de COCAFCAL de la cual es socio, Adelmo lleva más de 5 años trabajando en el rubro del café.
El café es el principal medio de subsistencia de su familia formada por él, su esposa Maria Fani y un hijo, El anhelo de Adelmo es formar un pequeño patrimonio para que su hijo tenga mejores oportunidades
La producción de café orgánico está dando oportunidades de crecimiento a muchas personas en la región ya que esto permite un mejor posicionamiento en el mercado así como una excelente oportunidad para hacer el cultivo más sostenible y amigable con el ambiente, aprovechando que sus cafetales estan muy deteriorados Adelmo renovara sus cafetales e iniciara la certificacion con los cafetales totalmente nuevos.
Adelmo solicita un crédito para convertir sus cafetales a producción orgánica, con las ganancias obtenidas por su café orgánico Adelmo espera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y empezar a ahorrar para formar un patrimonio para su familia.
Un crédito ayudara a Adelmo a mejorar su calidad de vida, la de su familia, además de ayudarle a hacer su cultivo de café mucho más sostenible y amigable con la rica biodiversidad de la región.
texts.en:
Adelmo is a 54 year old farmer dedicated to coffee production under different labels of certification such as: fair trade and Rain Forest under the supervision of COCAFCAL, of which he is a borrower. Adelmo has over 5 years working in the coffee industry.
Coffee is the main livelihood of his family, which includes him, his wife Maria and son Fani. Adelmo's longing is to form a small estate for his child to have better opportunities
The production of organic coffee is giving growth opportunities to many people in the region, as this better allows  positioning in the market as well as an excellent opportunity to make the most sustainable and environmentally friendly farming, taking advantage of their plantations. They are badly damaged, so Adelmo wants to renew their plantations and initiate the certification with brand new coffee plantations.
Adelmo is applying for credit to convert his plantations to organic production. With the profits from their organic coffee, Adelmo hopes to improve their quality of life and start saving to form a legacy for his family.
Adelmo will use this credit to help improve the quality of life for his family and help you make his farming more sustainable to make friendly coffee with the rich biodiversity of the region.
